GK16andhvc1u:56: yadvā svasya locanaṃ jñānaṃ tasya niyojanayā vyākhyānarūpānuraṇanadvārā samarpaṇena sphuṭayāmi prakāśayāmi,

GK16andhvc1u:65: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ vyākhyānaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ śravaṇañcabhīṣṭaṃ divyāñajanākhyā ṭippanī śrīśrīgaurakṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:68_2: locanākhye vyākhyāne viṣamasthalāni mukhyatvena viśadayitukāmasya divyāñjananāmikeyaṃ ṭippanī;
GK16andhvc1u:70_4: pūrṇaitatsūtrānuvṛttita ṛtpadānuvṛttyaiva nirvāhe prakṛtasūtre punā ṛdgrahaṇamānaṅvidhyu
GK16andhvc1u:80: nityodyoginaśca bhagavato 'sammohādyavasāyayogitvenotsāhapratītervīraraso bālapriyā vaṇañcābhīṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya sampattaye niṣpattaye,
GK16andhvc1u:81: tadubhayasampattau tadubhayahetukagranthapratiṣcaṭārūpaṃ phalaṃ granthakārasya ca siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:86: yadvā samucitāyā āśiṣaḥ prakaṭanaṃugranthato nibandhanaṃ taddvāreṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:88: vṛttikāra ityanena svecchetyādikaṃ na kārikārūpasūtrādyapadyamiti darśitam,
GK16andhvc1u:100: atha dhvaniṃ kāvyātmānaṃ ṭippanī vṛttikāra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:102: ata eva viśiṣṭasyevāripsitatvena mūle maṅgalākaroṇe 'pi nācāravirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:103: ke cittu mūle 'pi “kāvyasyātme' tiprathamakārikāyāmādyapadasya kāvyetyasyānyaparatve 'pi parārthopanītodakumbhadarśanavat śravaṇamātreṇāpi;
GK16andhvc1u:105: śabdamūrttidharasyaite viṣṇoraṃśā mahātmana“-- ityādipramāṇato bhagavatsphorakatvena vastunirddeśarūpamaṅgalaṃ jātamevetyāpi vadanti,

GK16andhvc1u:115_0: bālapriyā pratipādayiṣyatā granthakṛtā kṛtasyāsya prathamapadyasya kāvyarūpatvādasminnapi

GK16andhvc1u:117: na vācyārthamātramanenocyate kintu raso dhvanyate cetyarthaḥ,

GK16andhvc1u:128: nanu nakhānāṃ praharaṇatve 'pi kathaṃ trāṇakriyāṃ prati karaṇatvamityatastatsambhāvanāndarśayati-praharaṇeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:129: praharaṇaṃ hi svasyānyasya vā rakṣāṃ kartumupādīyata iti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:140: vibhāvādīnāṃ mitho nāntarīyakatvena “sadbhāvaśced vibhāvāderdvayorekasya vā bhaved /
GK16andhvc1u:148: ārteḥ punaśchedyatvaṃ nakhānparatyasambhāvanīyamapi tadīyānāṃ nakhānāṃsvecchānirmāṇaucityātsambhāvyata eveti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:149_0: atha vā trijagatkaṇṭako hiraṇyakaśipurviśvasyotkleśakara iti sa eva vastutaḥ prapannānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:150: kiṃ ca te nakhāḥ svacchena svacchatāguṇena nairmalyena;
GK16andhvc1u:151: svacchamṛdugrabhṛtayo bālapriyā śaktiḥusāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvastattā,
GK16andhvc1u:158: tattaddurjanebhyo jagato yastrāsaḥ tadapasāraṇe ya udyamaḥ sa ityarthaḥ, ukta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:160: imamarthaṃ manasikṛtya pūrvaṃ nityodyogina ityuktamiti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:162: ādyamicchāpadena dvitīyaṃ svapadena ca gamyamiti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:165: ucitetīcchāviśeṣaṇaṃ vā tasmin yadaucityāmarthāt svasya tasmāddhetorityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:176: svecchayā bhagavata icchayā yannirmāṇaṃunakhānāṃnarmāṇaṃ tena hetunā;
GK16andhvc1u:181: asmin pakṣe ātiṃśabda ātiṅkāraṇaṃlakṣayati tasyāvyabhiṭacāreṇa nikhilārtikāritvañca dhvanatīti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:185: tathāvidhasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ hananamārterevocchedanaṃ na tu kasya citprāṇina iti bhagavadbuddhiriti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:188: ārtimeva chinatti na tu kañjitprāṇinamityarthapratītyeti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:189: atra prapannetyādiviśeṣaṇaṃ trāṇāśīravādahetugarbhasvacchetyādipraśaṃsāparaṃpraśasyamānā hi devatā praseduṣī prepsitaṃ prayacchati,
GK16andhvc1u:200: naraharinakhānāṃ tacca lokottareṇa rūpema pratipāditam kiṃ ca tadīyāṃ svacchatāṃ kuṭilimānaṃ cāvalokya bālacandraḥ svātmani khedamanubhavati;
GK16andhvc1u:204: adya bālapriyā vakrahṛdyarūpākṛtyāyāsitatvasya bālacandra eva sambhavāttadarthasāmarthyamūlenetyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:218: tadhā ca vidāraṇādinā'yākasakāribhyo lokikanakhebhyo naraharinakānāṃ vāyatireko vyajyata iti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:219: prapannārticchida iti viśeṣaṇasahakāreṇa vyātirekāntarasyālaṅkārāntarasya ca dhvanindarśayati kitrcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:226: itiśabdasyānubhavatītyanena vyatirekālaṅkāra ityanena ca sambandho vodhyaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:233: ātmano hi santāpasyaiva cchedane kuśalatvaṃ na sarvāsāmārtīnāmiti bhāvaḥ,

GK16andhvc1u:246: locanam punarevaṃvidhā nakhā daśa bālacandrākārāḥsantāpārticchedakuśalāśceti tāneva loko bālendubahumānena paśyati,

GK16andhvc1u:250: na nakhā ete kintu bālendava iti lokasya pratīteḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:256_1: vāsyamidaṃ na bhāvaparaṃ bhaktasya bhedena bhajanīyadevatāviṣayakaratervyaṅgyāyāḥ khalubhāvatvam,
GK16andhvc1u:263: na ca nairapekṣye saṃsṛṣṭeḥ prasaṅga iti saṅkyam?
GK16andhvc1u:267: yadyapi sarvameva vastu tathāpīha rasālaṅkārabhinnaṃ vastupadena vivakṣitam,
GK16andhvc1u:272: kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti budhair yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvas tasyābhāvaṃ jagadur apare bhāktam āhus tam anye /
GK16andhvc1u:273: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
GK16andhvc1u:275: kāvyasyātmā dhvaniriti budhairyaḥ samāmnātapūrvastasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare bhāktamāhustamanye /
GK16andhvc1u:276: ke cidvācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye tattvamūcustadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye tatsvarūpam // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:277: locanam atha prādhānyenābhidheyasvarūpamabhidadhadapradhānatayā prayojanaprayojanaṃ tatsambaddhaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sāmarthyātprakaṭayannādivākyamāha-kāvyasyātmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:294: evañja tayorhetuhetumadbhāvena prayojanaprayojanarūpāyāḥ prīterabhidhānāttaddhetubhūtasya dhvanisvarūpajñānasya prakaṭanaṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:295: nanu budhaśabdasya sāmānyato jñātṛvācitvāt vṛttau 'kāvyatattvavidbhiri'ti kuto vyākhyātamityatastadavatārayati-kāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:305: asya ca sahṛdayamanaḥprītistaditi bhavati tadabhidhānasya tāddaśaprītistathā prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:306: prayojanaprayojanatāvacchedakakukṣau manaḥpadopādānaṃ ca bharatadarśanādhvanīnānāṃ prakriyāṃśe bhūmnā vyākaramadarśanānusāritvasphoraṇāya,
GK16andhvc1u:307: idamīye hi darśane sukhādiviśeṣaguṇānāṃ manoniṣṭatvamevābhimataṃ nātmaniṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:312: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnātapūrvaḥ samyak āsamantād mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:313: tasya sahṛdayajanamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpyabhāvamanye locanam ātmaśabdasya tattvaśabdenārthaṃ vivṛṇvānaḥ sāratvamaparaśābdavailakṣamyakāritvaṃ ca darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:327: tena cābādhitasvarūpatvarūpātmasāmyena dhvanirūpārtho lakṣyata iti jñāpanāya tattvaśabdena tadarthaviviraṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:335: tatsaṃjñāprakāreṇa saṃjñino bhānañjākṣepādinā bhavati yathā jātisaktipakṣe vyakterbhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:336: yadvā dhvanipadasya lakṣaṇayā dhvanisaṃjñita ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:347: nanvevaṃ dhvaniśabdasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakathane sati tasya 'sahṛdayamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpī'ti samanantaragranthavirodhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:359: locanam evaṃ tu yuktataram--itiśabdo bhinnakramo vākyārthaparāmarśakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:361: śabdapadārthakatve hi dhvanisaṃjñito 'rtha iti kā saṅgatiḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:365: pratyuta satyeva dharmiṇi dharmamātrakṛtā vipratipattirityalamaprastutena bhūyasā sahṛdayajanodvejanena /
GK16andhvc1u:370: avicchinnena pravāheṇa tairetaduktaṃ vināpi viśiṣṭapustakeṣu viniveśanādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:371: na ca budhā bhūyāṃso 'nādaraṇāyaṃ bālapriyā yādidaṃ saṃjñāprakāreṇa dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ vastu kāvyātmatvenābhihitaṃ tadaśraddhopahanyamānamānasajanabuddhyanurodhenaiva /
GK16andhvc1u:372: dhvanyamānatvaviśiṣṭārthasya sahṛdayapratītisiddhatayā tadbuddhyanurodhena ca samanantaragrantha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:373: yadvā nanvevaṃ dhvanipadasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakatve kathamabhāvādivādipratyutthānam,
GK16andhvc1u:374: teṣāṃ dhvanyamānatva eva vivādena dvanisaṃjñāyāṃ vivādābhāvādityata āha-vastutastvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:380: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ yocajanaṃ vyākyānaṃ veti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:402: yathā śabdādau satyeva dharmiṇi nityatvānityatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:403: prakṛte ca dhvanisaṃjñite dharmiṇi guṇālaṅkārāntarbhūtatvabhāktatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:451: jagaduriti liṭaḥ prayogasyopapattiṃ vṛttau vyācakṣīrannityādestadvivaraṇarūpatvādikañca darśayitumāha-na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:454: yadi na śrutāḥ kathantarhi dūṣayiṣyanta ityata āha-sambhāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:473: evaṃ liṭaḥ prayogaṃ prasādhyācakṣīrannityādiliṅprayogān prakṛtasaṅgatān darśayati-tahyākhyānāyaiveti /
GK16andhvc1u:475: na tu svatantratayetyevakārārthaḥ. vyākhyānāyetyasya sambhāvyetyanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:476: nanvacakṣīrannityādibhireva jagadurityasya vāyakhyāne sambhavati kiṃ madhye tadabhāvavādināñjāmī ityādigranthenetyaśāṅkāvāraṇāyāvatārayati-sambhāvanāpīti /
GK16andhvc1u:486: api tu vartamānataiva sphuṭeti vartamānenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:487: nanu cāsambhavadvastumūlayā sambhāvanayā yatsambhāvitaṃ taddūṣayitumaśakyamityāśaṅkyāha--vikalpā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:488: na tu vastu sambhavati tāddak yata iyaṃ sambhāvanā,
GK16andhvc1u:491: ata eva 'ācakṣīran' ityādayo 'tra sambhāvanāviṣayā liṅprayogā atītaparamārthe paryavasyanti /
GK16andhvc1u:499: nanu sambhavantītyasya sthāne sambhāvyanta ityucyatāṃ tadāpratijñā cādau kṛtā syādityatrāha-sambhāvyanta itīti /
GK16andhvc1u:509: vikalpā ityuktyā kathaṃ parihāra ityatastatprakāraṃ vyācaṣṭe-na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:515: pramāṇayuktyābhāsābhyāmadhiṣṭānabhūte kāvyātmani dhvanisvarūpe viruddhatayā kalpyanta iti vikalpāḥ pakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:525: paryavasyantīti mūle jagaduriti liṭyoga iva vṛttāvācakṣīrannityādisambhāvanārthakaliṅprayogo 'pi kriyāyāḥ sambhāvanārūpabuddhyāropitatvanimittkabhūtatve paryavasyatīrtthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:540: kiṃ vṛttaṃ yadi pūrvavanna bhavanasya sambhāvanetyayamevārtha ityalamaprakṛtena bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:541: tatra samayāpekṣamena śabdo 'rthapratipādaka iti kṛtvā vācyavyātiriktaṃ nāsti vyaṅgyam,
GK16andhvc1u:543: tadanākṣiptamapi vā na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ kumārīṣviva bhartṛsukamatadvitsu iti traya evaite pradhānavipratipattiprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:544: tatrābāvavikalpasya trayaḥ prakārāḥ-śabdarthaguṇālaṅkārāṇāmeva śabdorthaśobhākāritvāllokaśāstrātiriktasundaraśabdārthamayasya bālapriyā kāyasya śarīrasya /
GK16andhvc1u:552: yadi nāmetyādipadyasya śeṣabhūtamidamekapādātmakaṃ vākyam-yadi na syāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:554: kintu yathāyathameva vyāvasthitāntarbahirbhāga evāyaṃ kāyassyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:556: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ syādityarthaḥ. tadāpyatijugupsito 'yaṃ koyo niṣphala eva phalgutaraviṣayopabhogamātropayogitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:559: yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvanā kiṃ vṛttamiti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:560: tataḥ kiṃ syādi tyāsya vivaraṇaṃ-kiṃ vṛttamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:561: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ jātaṃ na kiñcidityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:562: yadi na syādityasya vivaraṇaṃ yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:565: ayamevārtha iti niṣedhasthale 'pi liṅassambhāvanaivārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:599_0: heturayaṃ vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra bodhyaḥ--yatra yatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ tatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:599_1: tatra tatraśabdārthaguṇādyanyatamatvamiti locanam kāvyasya na śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo
GK16andhvc1u:600: yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo 'sti yo 'smābhirna gaṇita ityekaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:601: yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhākāryeva na bhavatīti dvitīyaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:602: atha śobhākārī bhavati tarhyasmadukta eva guṇe vālaṅkāre vāntarbhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:611: tadyayā-'karmaṇyaṇ' ityatra kumbhakārādyudāharamaṃ śrutvā svayaṃ nagarakārādiśabdā utparekṣyante,
GK16andhvc1u:623: tathā ca paramate pratiyogiprasiddhyā tanniṣedha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:628: nanu vyaṅgyasya śobhākāritvaṃ svasaṃvedasākṣikaṃ kathamapahnūyata ityataḥ prakārāntaramāha- athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:640: asmaduktānāṃ gumādīnāṃ kāvyajīvitatvādiviśeṣamāśritya dhvanyādināmāntaraṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:657: tatra ca śabdagatāścārutvahetavo 'nuprāsādayaḥ locanam tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:659: anyau ca dvauviti pañca vikalpā iti tātparyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:669: saṃghaṭanāparyavasitaṃ tvarthaguṇebhya iti na guṇālaṅkāravyatirikto dhvaniḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:680: tadanatiriktavṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi locanam tathā dhvanirapi tadvyatiriktaśca cārutvahetuśca bhaviṣyatītyasiddho vyatireka ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tadanatiriktavṛttaya iti /
GK16andhvc1u:682: tathā hyanuprāsānāmeva dīptamasṛṇamadhyamavarṇanīyopayogitayā paruṣatvalalitatvamadhyamatvasvarūpavivecanāya vargatrrayasampādanārthaṃ tistro 'nuprāsajātayo vṛttaya ityuktāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:686: 'śabdārthaśarīram' ityādeḥ 'pratīyanta' ityantasya vṛttigranthasya sārārthaṃ vyākhyāyottaragranthaṃ prakṛtopayogaṃ darsayannavatārayati-nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:689: taccārutvakāri neti vyatirekavyāpterguṇālaṅkāravyatiriktāsu cārutvahetutyā sampratipannāsu vṛttirītiṣu vyabhicārādasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:706: vivariṣyate cedamupari. vṛttaya ityuktāḥ vṛttaya iti vyavahṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:723: tatra tṛtīyaḥ komalānuprāsa iti vṛttayo 'nuprāsajātaya eva /
GK16andhvc1u:726: pṛthakpṛthak sarūpāṇāṃ sajātīyānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nyāsaḥ upanibandhaḥ tam /
GK16andhvc1u:736: paruṣānuprāsaḥ masṛṇānuprāsa iti pāṭhastu anuprāsavṛtyoraikyābhiprāyeṇa yojyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:748: anena grāmyāyā vṛtteḥ rūḍhā komalasaṃjñā ca bhaṭṭodbhaṭoktā darśitā /
GK16andhvc1u:752: locanam jātau jātimato vartamānatvaṃ na syāt,
GK16andhvc1u:754: yathāha kaścit-- lokottare hi gāmbhīrye vartante pṛthivībhujaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:757: ata eva vyāpārabhedābhāvānna pṛthaganumeyasvarūpā apīti vṛttiśabdasya vyāpāravācino 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:759: udbhaṭādibhiḥ prayukte 'pi tasminnārthaḥ kaścodadhiko hṛdayapathamavatīrṇa ityabhiprāyeṇāha--gatāḥ avaṇagocaramiti /
GK16andhvc1u:760: bālapriyā śaṣāditattadvarṇaracanārūpāḥ paruṣādyā vṛttayo vastuto 'nuprāseṣu vartante /
GK16andhvc1u:763: yathā--gotvādijātayā gavādibiḥ. ataśca svāśrayābhivyaṅgyatvasāmyādvṛttīnāṃ jātitvopacāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:770: tarhi tatra vartanaṃ kinnāmetyata āha--tadanugraha eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:771: vṛttirūpajātikartṛkānugraha evetyartha. sa ca tatkartṛkaṃ bhedakadharmasamarpaṇaṃ rasābhivyañjanasāmarthyādhānaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:777: nāstyatiriktā vṛttirvyāpāro yāsāṃ tā ityārthakatayā vyācaṣṭe-nābhyadhiketi /
GK16andhvc1u:779: sa eva vṛttīnāmapīti bhāvaḥ. tadanatiriktā ityanuktvā evamukteḥ phalandaśayati-ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:785: anuprāsābhyadhikavyāpārasattve tu vṛttīnāṃ svarūpaṃ pṛthagabhidheyaṃ syāditi tadbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:798_0: teṣāṃ ca samucitavṛttyarpaṇe yadanyonyamelanakṣamatvena pānaka iva guḍamaricādirasānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:820: tathā ca mādhuryādiguṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ prātisvalikarūpeṇa rītiśabdavācyatvaṃ nāsti,
GK16andhvc1u:823: gauḍavidarbhapāñcālasambāndhano gauḍīyādayo ye desāsteṣāṃ tatratyākavīnāmiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:829: trividhamityanena rītigatamapi gauḍīyā vaidarbhī pāñjālīti trevidhyaṃ sūcitam /
GK16andhvc1u:841: prasiddhaprasthānavyatirekiṇaḥ kāvyaprakārasya kāvyatvahāneḥ locanam samudāyino nānya iti vṛttirītayo na gumālaṅkāravyatiriktā iti sthita evāsau vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:847: tathāpyatra dhvaniśabdavācyo na kaścidatirikto 'rtho labhyata iti nāmaśabdenāha /
GK16andhvc1u:861: 'ko 'yami' tyatra kiśabdaḥ kimeṣa cārutvasthānamuta cārutvaheturiti vikalpaniṣedhaparaścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti-naiṣa ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:866: kiṃśabde naivoktārthe labdhe ki nāmaśabdenetyata āha--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:871: etāvatā śabdārthatadgumālaṅkāravyatiriktasya kāvyaśobhāhetutvaviśiṣṭasya dhvanerabhāva eva siddhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:872: na tu svarūpeṇa dhvanerabhāva iti tatsiddhye pakṣāntaropakṣepa ityāśayenāvatārayati-nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:889: na ca tatsamayāntaḥpātinaḥ locanam cāsau nṛttagītavādyādisthānīyaḥ kāvyasya kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:895: pratiṣṭante paramparayā vyavaharanti yena mārgeṇa tatprasthānam /
GK16andhvc1u:906: bālapriyā kāvyasya samudāyitayā sambandhitvena hyasau vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:907: na ca guṇādibhyo vyatireke sati kāvyasambandhitvamasya śacakyopapādaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:941: jānantītyanena 'tatsamayāntaḥ pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścidi'ti sahṛdayān kāṃścitparikalpya tatprasidyā dhvanau kāvyavyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakalavidvanmanogrāhitāmavalambate /
GK16andhvc1u:942: locanam tadabhimatatvaṃ ca nāma kāvyalakṣaṇamuktaprasthānātirekiṇa eva bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:943_0: yathā hi khaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ karomītyukatvā ātānavitānātmā prāvriyamāṇaḥ sakaladehācchādakaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:944: paraiḥ paṭaḥ khalvevaṃvidho bhavati na khaṅga ityayuktatāya paryanuyujyamāna evaṃ brūyārt--iddaśā eva khaṅkāṃ sakalaśabdena nirākaroti /
GK16andhvc1u:954: ata eva iti bruvāṇa iti vakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:969: iddaśaḥ padārtha eva mama khaṅgatvenābhipreta ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:978: vidvanmanasāmucita viṣaya eva pravṛttisambhavādvidvatpadena uktābiprāyassūcita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:982: pūnarapare tasyābhāvamanyathā kathayeyuḥ--na sambhavatyeva dhvanirnāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:984: locanam evaṃ hi kṛte 'pi na kiñcitkṛtaṃ syādunmattatā paraṃ prakaṭiteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:986: jīvitaṃ ca nāma prasiddhaprasthānātiriktamalaṅkārakārairanuktatvāttacca na kāvyamiti loke prasiddhamita /
GK16andhvc1u:988: yadi hi tatkāvyasyanuprāṇakaṃ tenāṅgīkṛtaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā taccirantanairanuktamiti pratyuta lakṣaṇārhameva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:991: tathāpi dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamityasau na kenacidukta ityabhiprāyamāśaṅkya tṛtīyamabhāvavādamupanyasyati punarapara iti /
GK16andhvc1u:994: bālapriyā ko doṣa ityata āha--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:997: parantu unmattataiva prakāśitā syānna tu vidvattetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1018: evamapyasau dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamiti na kenaciduktaḥ dhvaniḥ kāvyātmeti kenāpi lakṣaṇakāreṇa noktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1022: vuño bhāvarthatve cārutvahetvantarbhāvoktiranupapannā syādato vyacaṣṭe-kamanīyasya karmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1027: teṣāmanyatamasyaiva vā apūrvasamākhyāmātrakaraṇe yatkiñcana kathanaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1043: dhvanirdhvanirit vīpsayā sambhramaṃ sūcayannādaraṃ darśayati--nṛtyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1044: tallakṣaṇakṛdbhistadyuktakāvyavidhāyibhistacchravaṇodbhūtacamatkāraiśca bālapriyā 'kiñca vāgvikalpānām' ityādigranthaṃ vyākhyāsyamānaṃ manasikṛtyāvatārayati locanenanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:1046: vividhaṃ chidyanta iti vicchittayaḥ vaicitryāṇi, tāsām /
GK16andhvc1u:1052: 'vāgvikalpānām' ityatra vākpadaṃ nānārthakaṃ vikalpapadaṃ vecitryārthakamiti vyācaṣṭe-vaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1076: sahastraśo hi mahātmabhiranyairalaṅkāraprakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca /
GK16andhvc1u:1079: na tvasya kṣodakṣamaṃ tattvaṃ kiñcidapi prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1080: tathā cānyena kṛta evātra ślokaḥ--- yasminnasti na vastu kiñcina manaḥprahlādi sālaṅkṛti locanam pratipattṛbhiriti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1083: svayaṃ darpaḥ paraiśca stūyamānatetyarthaḥ. vāgvikalpāḥ vākpravṛttihetupratibhāvyāpāraprakārā iti vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1088: yataśca śobāhetutve 'pi nādarāspadaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ. na ceyamabhāvasambhāvanā nirmūlaiva dūṣitetyāha--tathā cānyeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:1111_1: samarthanāya 'na cāsmābhirabhāvavādināṃ vikalpāḥ śrutāḥ' iti prāguktaṃ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1112: yathāśrutārthakasyāsya ślokasya śrutatve 'pi pūrvopadarśitānāṃ bahūnāmabhāvavādaprakārāṇāṃ viśiṣyāśrutatvena tadvacanasya tatparatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1113: granthakṛdityādinā matsaraṃ tadukterhetutvena vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairvakroktiśūnyaṃ ca yat /
GK16andhvc1u:1114: kāvyaṃ taddhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsañjaḍo no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1119: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairiti śabdālaṅkārāṇām /
GK16andhvc1u:1127: jaḍena pṛṣṭo bhrūbhaṅgakaṭākṣādibhirevottaraṃ dadattatsvarūpaṃ kāmamācakṣīteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1144: tat tathāvidhamarthālaṅkārādiśūnyaṃ 'kāvyaṃ dhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsan jaḍaḥ dhvalanessvarūpaṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭassan kimabhidadhāti /
GK16andhvc1u:1151: abhāva ukta ityasya śabdālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthaguṇānāmityanayorapi sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1162: yadvā-gate anyagamane gatamanugamanaṃ gatānugataṃ tadeṣāmastīti gatānukatikāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1166: kimityete vikalpāḥ prarasparasambaddhā vyākhyātā iti śaṅkāyāṃ vṛttigranthānuguṇyādityāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1173: bhajyate sevyate tadārthena prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti bhaktirdharmo 'bhidheyena sāmīpyādiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1195: gaṅgādipadalakṣyatīrādyarthenetyarthaḥ. nanvatra padārthakartṛkaṃ sevanannāma kimityata āha-utprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1201: tena ca vaktuḥ pratipatturvā tīrādergaṅgadipadena pratipādane sāmīpyādernimittatvena paryālocanarūpaṃ yadutprekṣaṇantadatra vivakṣitamityāha-prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1212: tāṃ prayojanatvenoddiśya tata bālapriyā gauṇārthasyāpyuktarītyaiva lābhe 'pi tallābhaḥ prakārāntareṇāpi vaktavya ityāśayenāhaguṇeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1217: siṃhādiśabdā hi siṃhatvādijātiṃ tadviśiṣṭavyakti vā abhidadhānā api svārthāvinābhūtān śauryādiguṇānapyākṣepātpratipādayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1221: kecittu-guṇasamudāyavṛtterityāsya guṇādvārā samudāye guṇini māmavakādau vṛttiryasya tasyetyarthamāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1228: nanu gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādistale lakṣyatīrādau gaṅgāgatapāvanatvādikameva pratipādyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:1230: evaṃ siṃho māṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādau siṃhāditādrūpyaṃ parākramātiśayādikaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1233: tathā ca sāmīpyataikṣaṇyādāvityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti cet;
GK16andhvc1u:1235: pare tu-sāmīpyādeḥ paramparayā prayojanasādhanatvatsāmīpyapadena pāvanatvādikaṃ taikṣṇyapadena siṃhatādrūpyādikañca lakṣaṇayāvivakṣitamato nāsaṅgatirityāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1253: locanam āgato bhākta iti gauṇo lākṣaṇikaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:1278: nanu dhvanirnāma guṇavṛttivyātirekī nāstīti vaktavye sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasya ko 'bhiprāya ityata āha-sāmānādhikaraṇyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1279: 'taṃ bhāktam' iti mūle 'dhvanisaṃjñitam' ityādinā vṛttau ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1284: na tu dhvanerasarvathopacārasparśitvamapītyamumarthandyotayituṃ siddhāntaviruddhatādātmyapakṣopakṣepārtho 'yaṃ sāmānādikaraṇyena nirdeśa iti bhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1297: mūlakāra iti śeṣaḥ. vṛttau 'gumavṛttiri'ti bhāktaśabdasya vyākhyānaṃ tatpadena prakṛte vivakṣitānarthānvivṛṇoti--guṇā ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:1299: yadyapi ca dhvaniśabdasaṃkīrtanena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyibhirguṇavṛttiranyo vā na kaścitprakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1300: tathāpi amukhyavṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyāvahāraṃ locanam guṇāḥ sāmīpyādayo dharmāstaikṣṇyādayaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:1302: tairupāyervṛttirvā śabdasya yatra sa guṇavṛtti- śabdo 'rtho vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1344: vṛttau 'anyo ve'tyātra guṇavṛtternyo mukhya ityarthabhramaḥ syādato vyācaṣṭa-guṇoti /
GK16andhvc1u:1348: darśayatā dhvanimārgau manākspṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti pariklpyaivamuktam-'bhāktamāhustamanye' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1352: bhāmahenoktaṃ--'śabdāśchandobhidānārthāḥ' iti abhidhānasya śabdādbhedaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhaṭṭodbhaṭo babhāṣe--'śabdānābhidhānamabhidhāvyāpāro mukhyo guṇavṛtiśca' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1356: yathāliśitapāṭhakaistu bālapriyā darśayate'ti manāk sparśe hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1358: anena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyina eva vivakṣitā ityāśayena pūrayati-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1360: lokoyuktiḥ kalāśceti mantavyāḥ kāvyahetavaḥ” iti śiṣṭaṃ pādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:1367: tathā cā'bhidhānam' iti vacanena bhāmaho 'guṇavṛtti'riti vacanena bhaṭṭoṭbhaṭo 'lakṣaṇe'ti vacanena vāmanaśca kāvyeṣu guṇavṛtyā vyavahāraṃ darśitavanta iti phalitārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1368: 'dhvanimārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣitaḥ 'ityamuṃ bhāgaṃ pūrvaṃpakṣopakṣepānuguṇyena vyācaṣṭe-taistāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1371_1: guṇavṛtyā vyacavahāraṃ darśayadbhireva bhāmahabhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ dhvanergamakaṃ pradarśitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1372: tairdhvanimārgasya sparśe 'pi lakṣaṇakaraṇena pṛthak tatsvarūpasyānirūpaṇādguṇavṛttireva dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1373: na tadatirikta iti taduktimarthasiddhāmupajīvyedaṃ bhāktavādaprasthānaṃ pravṛttamityāha- yathālikhitetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1374: tu śabdaḥ parantvityarthe . na lakṣita ityāsya vyākhyānam--tatsvarūpaviveko na kṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1376: tenevaṃvidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye locanam svarūpavivekaṃ kartumaśaknuvadbhistatsvarūpaviveko na kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1380: yadyevaṃ na yojyate tadā dhvanimārgaḥ spṛṣṭa iti pūrvapakṣābhidhānaṃ virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1401: yathāśrutaṃ vicāraṃ vinā yattadgranthānāṃ lakṣyabhūtānāṃ dhniyuktakāvyagranthānāmudgrahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tanmātreṇetyarthaḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:2227: tasyā ya ānandamayaḥ carvaṇārūpo vyāpāraḥ tena,
GK16andhvc1u:2236: yathā-- bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:2245: vastvalaṅkāradhvanyo rasadhvaniparyantatvameveti vayameva vakṣyāmastatra tatretyāstāṃ tāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:2246: vācyasāmarthyākṣiptamiti bhedatrayavyāpakaṃ bālapriyā vastvādidhvanito viśeṣamāha---sa ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:2268: vācyayorvastvalaṅkārayoriva dhvanyamānayorapi tayoḥ vibhāvādirūpatvena kasyacidrasasya vyañjakatayā paryavasānādrasadhvaniviśrāntatvamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2273: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣiptam' iti klībaikavacanāntatvena nirdeśādvastumātramityasyaiva viśeṣaṇamiti bhramaḥ sthādatastannivṛttaye vyācaṣṭe---vāyyasāmarthyakṣiptamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:2282: etadarthaṃ prathamaṃ tāvevodāharati--- 'bhrama dhārmika visrabdhaḥ sa śunako 'dya māritastena /
GK16andhvc1u:2284: bālapriy.ā rasādaya ityanayorapi yojanā kārtheti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2285: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣipta' iti paṭhi tu artha ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:2290: nanu śabdaśaktimūle dhvanau śabdaśaktireva sahakāriṇī netaretya āha--śabdetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2312: anyata uddhṛtya tatpratipādakavākyāni āharati prabandhamimaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2317_0: kacchādipadayoḥ kūlalatāgahaneti ca vivaraṇam locanam kasyāścitsaṅketasthānaṃ jīvitasarvasvāyamānaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:2325: sañcaraṇena yo 'ntarāyaḥ cauryasuratasya khalpakālavicchedarūpo vighnaḥ tadrūpo dāṣastasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2332: atra bhramamarūpe vākyārthe 'vidhirniṣedhābhāvarūpaḥ na tu praiṣādirūpo niyoga' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2333: nanu kimiti mukhya eva na syādityatrāha--pratiprasavātmaka iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2338: yathoktaṃ 'prāpte tu pratiṣedhe hi pratiprasavayogitā' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2344: ato bhramaṇasyedānīṃ na kaścit pratibandha iti niṣedhābhāvo 'tra vidheḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2346: na khalveṣā svairiṇī rājeva bhramaṇavidhiṃ karoti,
GK16andhvc1u:2352: atha bhramaṇaniṣedhasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan vācyatvādikaṃ nirākaroti--tetretyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:2362: tanna bālapriyā na vācyatā na abhidheyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:2371: ekaśśabda ekamarthamabhidhayā bodhayitvā punastayā arthāntaraṃ na bodhayati yataḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2378: śaktiḥ bodhajananasāmarthyaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā satī /
GK16andhvc1u:2382: yadyevaṃ tarhi niṣedhasyaivātra bodho bhavatviti śaṅkate---nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2393: 'vācyārthasya ca vākyārthe sambandhānupapattitaḥ' ityuktaṃ mukhyārthabādhaṃ darśayati--dṛptetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2394: bhrametyasya mukhyārthakatve dṛptatvādyabhidhānasya vaiyarthyāpattyā dṛptādipadārthaghaṭitavākyārthe bhramaṇavidhirūpamukhyārthasya yo 'nanvayaḥ anvayopapattyabhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2406: naitat; trayo hyatra vyāpārāḥ saṃvedyante--padārtheṣu sāmānyātmasvabhidhāvyāpāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2415: na tu vyañjitamiti vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2441: tathā ca sarvasmin viśeṣe samayaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2451: agṛhītasaṅketakasyāpi gavādivyaktiviśeṣasya gavādivyaktiviśeṣasya gavādipadena bodhodayāttatra saṅketagrahasya vyabhicārāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2452: atha dvitīyaṃ vyāpāraṃ saviṣayaṃ darśayati--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2457: tātparyaśāktiḥ sa vākyārthaḥ paraḥpradhānatayā pratipādyaḥ yeṣāṃ tāni tatparāṇi teṣāṃ bhāvastātparya tadrūpā śaktiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2460: sāmānyāni padairabhihitāḥ sāmānyarūpā arthāḥ anyathā viśeṣāṇāmanavagamane /
GK16andhvc1u:2464: 'sāmānyānanyathe'ti pāṭhe tu locanam tatra ca dvitīyakakṣyāyāṃ 'bhrame'ti vidhyatiriktaṃ na kiñcitpratīyate,
GK16andhvc1u:2466: na hi 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ' 'siṃho baṭuḥ' ityatra yathānvaya eva bubhūṣan pratihanyate,
GK16andhvc1u:2468: tathā tava bhramamaniṣeddhā sa śvā siṃhena hataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2470: ata eva mukhyārthabādhā nātra śaṅkyeti na viparītalakṣaṇāyā avasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2476: parasparaṃ virodha iti cet--so 'yaṃ tarhyanvaye virodhaḥ pratyeyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2501: atha lakṣaṇāprayojanaviṣaye dhvanivyāpāraṃ pradarśayiṣyannabhyupagamyāpi lakṣaṇāntasyāḥ pūrvapakṣyabhimatatātparyaśaktiviṣayakakṣyāniveśaṃ nirākurvannāha--bhavatu vetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2516: uktī virodhaḥ padārthānāṃ svātmanyuta parasparamiti vikalpaṃ hṛdi nidhāyādyaṃ nirācaṣṭe-na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2526: nanvevaṃ 'aṅgulyagre karivaraśatam' kintu pramāṇāntareṇa so 'nvayaḥ pratyakṣādinā bādhitaḥ pratipanne 'pi śuktikāyāṃ rajatamiveti tadavagamakāriṇo vākyasyāprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2527: 'siṃhomāṇavakaḥ' ityatra dvitīyakakṣyāniviṣṭatātparyaśaktisamarpitānvayabādhakollāsānantaramabhidhātātparyaśaktidvayavyatirikta bālapriyā tarhi saḥ lakṣaṇamūlatvena prasiddhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2533: dharmiṇyapratīte dharmarūpasya virodhasya tatra pratītyayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2537_0: mukhyārthabādhā nāma lakṣaṇāsthale 'siho māṇavaka' ityādau siṃhādipadamukhyārthasya
GK16andhvc1u:2538: viruddhatvaṃ ca tasminnanvaye siṃhādipratiyogikatvasya māṇavakādyanuyogikatvasya ca dvayorabhāvena tadrūpaṃ bādhitatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:2540: bhavati ca satyapi bādhaniścaye vākyajanyo bodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2550: 'pratipanno 'pi so 'nvayaḥ śuktikāyāṃ rajatamiṃva pratyakṣādinā pramāṇāntareṇa bādhita' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2554: nanu tarhi 'siṃho māṇavaka' ityāderapyaprāmāṇyaṃ syādityatrāha--siṃha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2558: tadvādhakasya anvayabādhakasya vidhurīkaraṇe locanam tāvattṛtīyaiva śaktistadbādhakavidhurīkaraṇanipuṇā lakṣaṇābhidhānā samullasati /
GK16andhvc1u:2564: na yasya kasyaciditi cet-guṇālaṅkāraucityasundaraśabdārthaśarīrasya sati dhvananākhyātmani kāvyarūpatāvyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2569: tathā hi-tritayasannidhau lakṣaṇā pravartata iti tāvadbhavanta eva vadanti /
GK16andhvc1u:2571: nimittaṃ ca yadabidhīyate sāmīpyādi tadapi pramāṇāntarāvagamyameva /
GK16andhvc1u:2574: tathā ca tatra lakṣyārthasya na bādhitatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2582: guṇālaṅkārāṇāmaucityena rasaviṣayakeṇa sundarau śabdārthāveva śarīlaṃ tasya /
GK16andhvc1u:2586: tatā dhvananākhyātmano laukikavākye sattve 'pi nāsāratā kāpītyartha /
GK16andhvc1u:2607: atha yatra yatraivaṃśabdaprayogastatra tatra taddharmayoga ityanumānam,
GK16andhvc1u:2608: tasyāpi vyāptigrahaṇakāle maulikaṃ pramāmāntaraṃ vācyam, na cāsti /
GK16andhvc1u:2611: bālapriyā 'yattu atipavitratvādikaṃ parākramātiśayaśālitvaṃ vā tatre'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2613: idaṃ cātipavitratvādeḥ tīre pratyāyānadvārā ghoṣa'pi tatpratyāyanamasti tasyaiva paramatātparyaviṣayatvādityāśayenoktam /
GK16andhvc1u:2620: nanu tarhi śabdenāpi na tatpratītirityalaṃ tahyāpārāntaragaveṣaṇayetyata āha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2622: śabdasya na tāvanna vyāpāra ityuktaṃ draḍhayati--tathāṃ hītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:2649: sāmānyamukhavyāptyadhīnānamitisthale prakṛtasādhyahetvoḥ tatsajātīyayorvā pratyakṣādinā vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2652: iyaṃ pāvanatvādiprayojanajñānaṃ locanam niyamāpratipattervakturetadvivakṣitamityadhyavasāyābhāvaprasaṅgāccatyasti tāvadatra śabdasyaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2659: tatrāpi hi skhaladgatitve punarmukyārthabādā nimittaṃ prayojanamityanavasthā syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2660: ata eva yatkenacillakṣitalakṣaṇeti nāma kṛtaṃ tahyasanamātram /
GK16andhvc1u:2669: yata evaṃ nānyagamyaṃ prayojanaṃ tata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2679: tasmādyat skhaladgatitvaṃ skalantī pratihanyamānā gatiravabodhanavyāpāro yasya śabdasya tasya bhāvastattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:2690: prayojanaṃ nimittīkṛtyāpi lakṣyārthāt skhaladgatitve 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe punaḥ punarapi lakṣaṇāmūlaparikalpanayālakṣaṇānavasthā syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2693: gaṅgādiśabdena tīrādau lakṣite punaḥ pāvanatvādiprayojanamapi lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:2694: ata eva tallakṣaṇāyāḥ lakṣitalakṣaṇeti nāmeti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:2700: vakṣyate ca “tenāyaṃ lakṣatalakṣaṇāyā na viṣayaḥ” iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2705: yaduddisya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:2711: bālapriyā sodarāḥ paryāyāśca ye vyapadeśāḥ śabdāḥ taiḥ nirūpito niścita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2713: vyapadeśaśca vyapadeśyaṃ vinā na tiṣṭatīti tacchravaṇānyathānupapattinirūpaṇīyo 'yamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:2716: evaṃ prayojanaviṣayakaṃ dhvananavyāpāraṃ prasādhya tamevetaravyāpāratrayādbhedena spaṣṭayituṃ vyāpārāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ darśayati--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2722: anyathā ātmānaṃ vinā anupapattirasambhavaḥ prayojanābhāvādinā sahāyo yasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc1u:2723: kecittu tasya viśeṣarūpasyānvitārthasya anyathā tātparyābhāve yā anupapattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2733_1: locanam sa ca prāgvṛttaṃ vyāpāratrayaṃ nyakkurvanpradhānabhūtaḥ kāvyātmetyāśayena
GK16andhvc1u:2754: tathāca kathaṃ vṛttikṛtā 'pratiṣedharūpa' iti vadatā vyañjanāvyāpārasya niṣedhaviṣayakatvamuktamityata āha-ityāśayenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2755: ityāśayena uktabhiprāyeṇa 'prayojanaviṣayo 'pi saḥ niṣedhapramukhatayā niṣedhaviṣaya ityuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2763: vastuto 'tra lakṣaṇā na pravartata iti vṛttigranthānuguṇyenāha--abhyupagametyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2768: yatra vācyasyātyantatiraskāro 'nyasaṅkramaṇaṃ vā tatra hi lakṣaṇā /
GK16andhvc1u:2771: tatrāpi kiṃ na lakṣaṇetyata āha--na hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2783: ayaṃ vaktā edvibakṣuḥ etacchabdaprayogāt ityādiḥ prayogo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2788: yopyanvitābhidhānavādī 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hṛdaye grahūtvā śaravadabhidhāvyāpārameva dīrghadīrghamicchati,
GK16andhvc1u:2793: sajātīye ca kārye viramyavyāpāraḥ śabdakarmabuddhyādīnāṃ padārthavidbhirniṣiddhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2797: atha ca jñāyamānaḥ saṃjñāśabdaḥ saṃjñini cakṣussannikarṣādikāle svaviśeṣaṇakaṃ saṃjñipratyakṣaṃ janayati iti mataviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2808: yo 'rthaḥ paraḥ pradhānapratipādyaḥ tātparyaviṣayo yasya saḥ śabdārthaḥ śabdābhidheyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2812: yathā dhanurdhareṇa preritaśśaro vegākhyenaikeneva vyāpārema parasya varmacchedanagātrabhedanādikā anekakriyāḥ karoti,
GK16andhvc1u:2813: tathā sukavinā prayuktaḥ śabdo 'bhidhākhyenaikenaiva vyāpāreṇa padārthavākyārthayolaṅkṣyatvena vyaṅgyatvenābhimatayośca pratītīrjanayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2814: itthaṃ tanmatamupanyasya tenāpi dhvananamaṅgīkārayituṃ sa dīrgho 'bhidhāvyāpāraḥ kimekaḥ prativiṣayamaneko veti vikalpyādyaṃ pratyācaṣṭe-tasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2829: sa eva jhaṭiti vākyenābhidhīyata ityevaṃvidhaṃ dīrghadīrghatvaṃ vivakṣitam,
GK16andhvc1u:2834: tasya paścāttanāḥ padārthāvagamāḥ bālapriyā sahakāriṇaḥ samayamukyārthabādhādivaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2848: yadvāsajātīya ityāderayamarthaḥ--kiñca vyāpārasya yatkāryamanekārthajñānaṃ tatatatsajātīyamanyadveti vikalpaṃ manasi nidhāyāha--sajātīya ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2857: atha vyāpārasya dīrghatvaṃ nāma naikatvamekajātīyatvaṃ vā;
GK16andhvc1u:2879: locanam nimittabhāvaṃ gacchantīti nūnaṃ mīmāṃsakasya prapautraṃ prati naimittikatvamabhimatam /
GK16andhvc1u:2880: athocyate--pūrvaṃ tatra saṅketagrahaṇasaṃskṛtasya tathā pratipattirbhavatītyamuyā vastusthitayā nimittatvaṃ padārtānām,
GK16andhvc1u:2884: āvāpodvāpābhyaṃ tathābhāva iti cet-saṅketaḥ padārthamātra evetyabhyupagame pāscātyaiva viśeṣapratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2885: athocyate--ddaṣṭeva jhaṭiti tātparyapratipattiḥ kimatra kurma iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2890: kiṃ tu sātisayānuśīlanābhyāsāttatra sambhāvyamānī'pi kramaḥ sajātīyatadvikalpaparamparānudayādabhyastaviṣayavyāptisamayasmṛtikramavanna saṃvedyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2894: atha padārtapratīteḥ paścāttanatve 'pi tadviṣayakasaṅketagrahaṇasya pūrvaṃ jātatvāttaddvārakaḥ padārthānāṃ nimittatvavyapadeso na virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2895_0: upalabhyate hi gṛhūtasaṅketasya pratipattur'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityādiyākyaścavaṇānantarameva
GK16andhvc1u:2897: tasyāḥ pāryantikārthapratīteḥ anusaraṇe svamatena nirvahaṇe yadupayogi /
GK16andhvc1u:2898: yadvā-tadanusaraṇe padārtānāṃ pāryantikārthasyāsaṅketitasya kathamavagamo bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2899: kiñca pūrvaṃ padārtheṣu saṅketagrahamapi na ghaṭata ityāha--na cāpīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2904: tathābhāvaḥ pṛthak pṛthak padārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇasya bhavanam /
GK16andhvc1u:2913: padārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇasya nimittatā bhavatu mā veti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2922: sajātīyāḥ vākyārthapratītyaṅgatvena sajātīyāḥ ye tadvikalpāḥ padārthaviṣayakapratyayāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2929: taduttīrṇatve tu sarvaṃ parameśvarādvayaṃ brahyotyasmacchāstrakāreṇa na na viditaṃ tatvālokagranthaṃ viracayatetyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:2936: abhyastaḥ bhūyo bhūyaḥ paryālocito viṣayo yayoste /
GK16andhvc1u:2937: yadvā-abhyaste viṣaye dhūmādihetau gavādyarthe ca yo vyāptisamayayoḥ vahnyādisādhyavyāptigavādipadasaṅketayoḥ smṛtī,
GK16andhvc1u:2950: śrutyādipadārthāstadudāharaṇāni cāpodevīyādau kāvyapradīpādau ca grante prapañcitāni /
GK16andhvc1u:2955: etannimittatāvaicitryañca abhidhāyā dīrghadīrghatvāṅgīkāre nopapadya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2966_0: locanam yattu bhaṭṭanāyakenoktam--iha dṛptasiṃhādipadaprayoge ca dhārmikapadaprayoge
GK16andhvc1u:2973: tasya ca śabdavācyatvaṃ tenāpi nopagatamiti bālapriyā yatvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2979: śvamāraṇanimittabhramaṇavidhisiddhaṃ dhārmikabhīrutvaṃ vinā niṣedhārtho na sidhyatīti dhārmiketyādyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:2999: etasya vākyasya sambandhinau etau vā yau vaktṛpratipattṛviśeṣau saṅketasthānaparirakṣaṇotsukakāminībhīrudhārmikau,
GK16andhvc1u:3005: tasyāstitvamātraṃ na niṣedhāvagatiṃ prati hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3006: kathaṃ boddhavye dhārmike bhayānakarasāveśa ityata āha--tasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3023: tarhi vaktṛpratipattṛpratibhāprāṇito dhvananavyāpāraḥ kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3024: kiṃ ca vastudhvaniṃ dūṣayatā rasadhvanistadanugrāhakaḥ samarthyata iti suṣṭhutarāṃ dhvanidhvaṃso 'yam /
GK16andhvc1u:3028: atha vastumātradhvaneretadudāharaṇaṃ na yuktamityucyate tathāpi kāvyodāharaṇatvāddvāvapyatra dhvanī staḥ, ko doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3029: yadi tu rasānuvedhena vinā na tuṣyati,
GK16andhvc1u:3047: uktanayenāpasiddhāntāpātādapi rasāveśakṛtā niṣedhāvagatiriti vaktuṃ na śakyamityupahāsamukhenāha--kiñcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3049: bhayānakavibhāvādīnabhidadhatyā tadrasāveśaśaktisahakāriṇyā abhidhayā arthādabhihita evāyaṃ niṣedha ityabhiprāyeṇa dūṣayatetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3055: rasasya prādhānyameva darśitaṃ na tu vastudhvanerdūṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3075: tathā tasyaivābhilāṣasya ucitāḥ sambhogānuguṇyādviśiṣṭāśca ye kākvādayaḥ anubhāvāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3078: tasyānuvedha locanam rasasyālaukikatvāttāvanmātrādeva cānavagamātprathamaṃ nirvivādasiddhaviviktavidhiniṣedhapradarśanābhiprāyeṇa caitadvastudhvanerudāharaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16andhvc1u:3090: yaḥ pūrvaṃ karṇopakarṇikayā tvayāpyākarṇito godāvarīkacchagahane prativasatīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3106: sa ca pramāṇena kenāpi na siddho loke,
GK16andhvc1u:3108: atastatpratipādanārthamārabhamāṇena tadupoddhātatayā prathamaṃ vastudhvanyādikamanyadeva vācyādbhinnatvena pradarśanīyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:3119: 'adye'ti padaṃ pūrvaṃ bidhiḥ pratikūlo 'bhūdidānīṃ tu bhavadbhāgyamahimnānukūlo jāta ityarthaṃ dyotayatītyaha--diṣṭyati /
GK16andhvc1u:3129: saṅketasthānarakṣaṇārtamanyāpadeśena vavacidvācye pratiṣedharūpe vidhirūpo yathā-- attā ettha ṇimajjai etya ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16andhvc1u:3130: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16andhvc1u:3131: locana.m dṛptatvāttato gahanānnissaratīti prasiddhagodāvarītīraparisarānusaraṇamapi tāvatkathāśeṣībhūtaṃ kā kathā tallatāgahanapraveśaśaṅkayeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3133: śvaśrūratra śete athavā nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya /
GK16andhvc1u:3135: maha iti nipāto 'nekārtavṛttiratrāvayorityarthe na tu mameti /
GK16andhvc1u:3136: evaṃ hi viśeṣavacanameva śaṅkākāri bhavediti pracchannābhyupagamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3137_1: niṣedhadvāreṇa tayābhyupagata iti niṣedhābhāvo 'tra bālapriyā pūrvaṃ svairiṇyai vṛttānto
GK16andhvc1u:3138: nanvevaṃ kimiti svayamuktamityata āha--sa cādhunā tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:3142: dharmikasya śaṅgā mā bhūditi 'gaude'tyādyanuvādapūrvakaṃsiṃhasya dṛptatvādiviśeṣo bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3151: evaṃ hi pracchannābhyupagamo na syāditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3171: kākvādisahāyasya ca tāvati dhvananameva vyāpāra iti dhvanerbhūṣaṇametat /
GK16andhvc1u:3173: atha yadyapi bhavānmadanaśarāsāradīryamāṇahṛdaya upekṣituṃ na yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3187: samucite sambhogayogye samaye rātrau bhaviṣyatītyātmanā sambhāvyamāno yo 'rthaḥ tannimittakā ye vikarāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3207: anurāgātirekeṇa sambhāvito ya āvayoranibhṛtaḥ sambhogaḥ tasya parihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3209: upekṣituṃ na yukta ityanena svasyābhilāṣo 'pi pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3212: 'diasaam' ityasya kathaṃ prathamāntatayā vyākhyānamityata āha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3213: na copekṣe kvacidvācye vidhirūpe 'nubhayarūpo yathā--- vacca maha vvia ekkei hontu ṇīsāsaroiavvāiṃ /
GK16andhvc1u:3214: mā tujja vi tīa viṇā dakkhiṇṇahaassa jāantu //
GK16andhvc1u:3216: pratipannamātrāyāṃ ca rātrāvandhībhūto madīyāyāṃ śayyāyāṃ māṃ śliṣaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3219: mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇyahatasya janiṣata //
GK16andhvc1u:3224: kevalaṃ pūrvakṛtānupālanātmanā dākṣiṇyenaikarūpatvābhimānenaiva bālapriyā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3244: 'sthita iti yat tat kevalaṃ dākṣiṇyenaive'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3247: pūrvakṛtena pūrvakarmaṇā addaṣṭena hetunā yadanupālanaṃ matpālanam /
GK16andhvc1u:3248: yadvā-pūrvakṛtaṃ yaddākṣiṇyaṃ tasyānupālanamavicchedena pālanaṃ tadātmanā dākṣiṇyena /
GK16andhvc1u:3252: ahisāriāṇaṃ vigdhaṃ karosi aṇaṇāṇaṃ vi haāse //
GK16andhvc1u:3273: nivartasvetyanena māgama ityarthasyoktatayā gamananiṣedho vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3276: locanam nāyake sata tataḥ pratigantuṃ pravṛttā,
GK16andhvc1u:3278: na kevalaṃ svātmano mama ca nirvṛtividhnaṃ karoṣi,
GK16andhvc1u:3280: tatastava na kadācana sukhalavalābho 'pi bhaviṣyatītyata eva hatāśāsīti vallabhābhiprāyarupaścāṭuviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3281: yadi vā sakhyopadiśyamānāpi tadavadhīraṇayā gacchantī sakhyocyate-na kevalamātmano vidhnaṃ karoṣi,
GK16andhvc1u:3285_1: punarapi vācya eva viśrānterguṇībhūtavyaṅgyabhedasya preyorasavadalaṅkārasyodāharaṇamidaṃ syāt, na dhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3325: kassa vaṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharam /
GK16andhvc1u:3327: anyāsāñca vidhnaṃ karoṣi tava cepsitalābho bhaviṣyatīti kā pratyāśā /
GK16andhvc1u:3329: tvadīyaṃ vā gacchāvetyubhayatrāpi tātparyādanubhayarūpo vallabhābipārāyascāṭvātmā vyaṅgya ityateyeva vyavatiṣṭate /
GK16andhvc1u:3331: tatra hatāśe ityāmantraṇādi yuktamayuktaṃ veti sahṛdayā eva pramāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:3333: adhunā tu viṣayabhedādapi vyaṅgyasya vācyādbheda ityāha--kvacidvācyāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:3335: viṣayabhedo 'pi vicitrarūpo vyavatiṣṭamānaḥ sahṛdayairvyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3336: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam /
GK16andhvc1u:3348: anyāsāṃ ca tvadgṛhagamanotsukasya mama ceti cakārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3350: ata eva yata evaṃrūpo vācyārthaḥ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3351: 'madīyaṃ gṛhamāgaccha tvadīyaṃ vā gṛhaṅgacchāveti cāṭavātmā vallabhābhiprāyo vyaṅgya' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3355: atra pakṣe 'nivartasve' tyasya tavādhvavasāyānnivartasveti vācyārthe bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3357: pakṣe 'smin taṭasthānāṃ nāyikāpremābāvātteṣāṃ vacanaṃ na pravartakaṃ ,
GK16andhvc1u:3358: na vā nivartakamataḥ pūrvoktavyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatvaṃ neti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3360: nanu vṛttau 'vyavasthāpita' ityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchate vyavasthāpanasyāniṣpannatvādityato vyācaṣṭe--viṣayabhedo 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3363: 'kasya ve'ti vākāro 'vadhāraṇārthaṅko dṛṣṭvetyuttaraṃ thojya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---dṛṣṭvaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3366: anye caivaṃprakārā vācyādvibhedinaḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ sambhavanti /
GK16andhvc1u:3370: sabhramarapajhāghrāmaśīle śīlaṃ hi kathañcidapi vārayituṃ na śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3374: atrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ---kācidavinītā kutaścitkhaṇḍitādharā niścitatatsavidhasaṃnidhāne tadbhartari tamanavalokamānayeva kayācidvidagdhasakhyā tadvācyatāparihārāyaivamucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3378: tasyāṃ ca priyatamena gāḍhamupārabyamānāyāṃ tahyalīkaśaṅkitaprātiveśakalokaviṣayaṃ saubhāgyātiśayakhyāpanaṃ priyāyā iti śabdabalāditi sapatnīviṣayaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3381: kenāpi kāraṇena pragaddaṣṭaviśeṣavattayā pramukhataḥ savraṇatayā vilokyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3382: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kṛtaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3383: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kutaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3386: ukte vācyārthe sthite vakṣyamāṇo vyaṅgyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3405: tasya bharturvyalīkamapriyamanayā kṛtamiti śaṅkito yaḥ prātiveśikalokastadviṣayamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3425: tṛtīyastu rasādilakṣaṇaḥ prabhedo vācyasāmarthyākṣiptaḥ locanam lāghavamātmani grahītuṃ na yuktaṃ;
GK16andhvc1u:3429: punaḥ prakaṭaradanadaṃśanavidhirna vidheya iti taccauryakāmukaviṣayasambodhanaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3433: dvitīyoddyote 'asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ krameṇoddyotitaḥ paraḥ' iti vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dvitīyaprabhedavarṇanāvasare /
GK16andhvc1u:3434: yathā hi vidhiniṣedhatadanubhayātmanā rūpeṇa saṃkalayya vastudhvaniḥ saṃkṣepeṇa suvacaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3455: na hyetatsarvaṃ svotprekṣāmātreṇoktamapi tu vidhidhamavasthāpito 'vyavasthāpita' iti vṛttigranthānurodhenetyāha---tadetadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3456: nanu vastudhvanivadalaṅkāradhvanerapyatraiva pradarśanīyatve kimityagre darśayiṣyata ityuktamityatastātparyamāha-yathā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3481: tanmayībhavanadaśāyāṃ tu raterevāsvādyateti śṛṅgārataiva bhāti paurvāparyavivekāvadhāraṇena 'dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śutim' ityādau /
GK16andhvc1u:3483: tadaṅgaṃ bhāvābhāsaścittavṛtteḥ praśama eva prakāntayā hṛdayamāhlādayati yato viśeṣeṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:3485: yathā-- ekasmin śayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyato- ranyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16andhvc1u:3488: na cāyaṃ rasādirarthaḥ 'putraste jātaḥ' ityato yathā harṣo jāyate tathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3490: api tu sahṛdayasya hṛdayasaṃvādabalādvibhāvānubhāvapratītau bālapriyā vibhāvābhāsajñānadvārā sthāyyābhāsaniścayenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3501: bhāvaśabdenaiva bhāvapraśamasyāpi grahaṇasambhavāt kimiti pṛthak tadgrahaṇamityata āha-cittavṛtterityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3517: yadvyāvṛttaṃ vyāvartanaṃ tena ca sahitaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yatra, tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3523: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣiptaḥ prakāśata' ityanena darśitaṃ vibhāvādivyaṅgyatvaṃ rasādeḥ sādhayiṣyan ādau tasya tātparyaśaktigamyatvaṃ niṣedhati---na cetyādi tathetyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3527: na tu sākṣācchabdavyāpāraviṣaya iti vācyādvibhinna eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3528: tathā hi vācyatvaṃ tasya svaśabdaniveditatvena vā syāt vibhāvādipratipādanamukhena vā /
GK16andhvc1u:3530: locanam tanmayībhāvenāsvādyamāna eva rasyamānataikaprāṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvasukhādivilakṣaṇaḥ parisphurati /
GK16andhvc1u:3533: vibhāvādyarthe 'pi na putrajanmaharṣanyāyena tāṃ cittavṛttiṃ janayatīti jananātirikto 'rthasyāpi vyāpāro dhvananamevocyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3538_0: tatra svaśabdasyānvayavyatirekau rasyamānatāsāraṃ rasaṃ prati nirākurvandhvananasyaiva
GK16andhvc1u:3538_1: tāviti bālapriyā tathā kāvyaṃ vibhāvādyarthapratipādanadvārā tātparyaśaktyā rasacarvaṇāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3552: siddhasvabhāvā ye sukhādayo bhāvāḥ sukhapadena ratirvivakṣitā /
GK16andhvc1u:3559: athārthasyāpi dhvananameva vyāpāra iti janakatvaniṣedhapūrvakaṃ darśayati-vibhāvādyartho 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3575: na hi kevalaśṛṅgarādibdamātrabhāji locanam darśayati--na ca sarvatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:3576: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya--- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc1u:3577: dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṣṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:3584: tathā hiyāte dvāravatīṃ tadā madhuripau taddattajhampānatāṃ bālapriyā vyabhicāraviṣayamudāharati---yaditi /
GK16andhvc1u:3601: teṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ ta eva vā ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3602: teṣāmucitā yāścittavṛttayaḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpāstāsāṃ vāsanābhiranurañjitāyā rūṣitāyāssvasaṃvido yā ānandamayī carvaṇā tasyāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3606: atrābhilāṣo mahāvākyena cintādayastvavānravākyena vyajyanta iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3608: yadi lakṣye svaśabdena rasādipratītistarhyanvayaḥ syānna tu svaśabdenāto 'nvayābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3620: utkamityanena tūktānubhāvānukarṣaṇaṃ katuṃ sotkaṇṭhāśabdaḥ prayukta ityanuvādo 'pi nānarthakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3621: punaranubhāvapratipādane hi punaruktiratanmayībhāvo vā na tu tatkṛtetyatra hetumāha---viṣāyāntara iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3622: 'yadviśramya' bālapriyā dattā yā jhampā vegenordhvādideśādāsphālanapūrvakapatanakriyā viharaṇakālabhavā tayā /
GK16andhvc1u:3625: 'sampannate'ti pāṭhe tena dattā sampāditā sampannatā puṣpapallavādisamṛddhiryasyāstāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3631: guruṇā prabhūtena bāṣpeṇa ruddhakaṇṭhatayā gadgadaṃ yathā tathā galan prasaran tāra uccaistaśca svaro yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3653: kevalaśabdanātra vibhāvānubhāvau prati sahakāritvamapi neti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:3655: ayamarthaḥ---jalacāriṇāṃ kūjite 'pi gurubāṣpetyādyuktānubhāvānāṃ saṃyojana eva tanmayībhavanayukatyā tadutkaṇṭhāyāścarvaṇāgocaratvaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3659: sati ca pūrvavākye sotkaṇṭhāśabde tatsaṃgṛhītānāmanubhāvānāṃ sotkaṇṭhāsamānārthakotkaśabdena pratipādanaṃ bhavatīti sotkaṇṭhāśabdassaprayojana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3664: yataśca svābhidhānamantareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiṣṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3669: na hi yadabhāve 'pi yadbhavati tatkṛtaṃ taditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3678: evaṃ svaśabdena saha rasādervyatirekānvayābhāvamupapatyā pradarśya tathaivopasaṃharati-yataścetyādinā kathañcidityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3679: abhidheyameva sāmarthyaṃ sahakāriśaktirūpaṃ vibhāvādikaṃ rasadhvanane śabdasya kartavye,
GK16andhvc1u:3680_1: cānumānavyatirikte dhvanane kartavye sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ viśiṣṭasamucito vācakasākalyamiti
GK16andhvc1u:3684: yena siddhavannirdeśa ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimatasyaiva kāvyarūpatvaprasañjanābhiprāyeyamuktirityāha---tava mata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3685: svaśabdakṛtā rasādipratītiḥ na vibhāvādikṛtetyasmin mate kāvyatvenānabhimatamapi kāvyamāpadyetetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3694: karmadhārayāśrayaṇena śabde yojayitvā ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣāśrayeṇārthe yojayati---abhidheyasya yetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3698: na tathā vibhāvādyartho rasaṃ janayatīti tadvilakṣṇatvamarthagatadhvananasya /
GK16andhvc1u:3702: guṇālaṅkārādiviśiṣṭena samucitena rasānuguṇena ca vācakena iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyādbhinna eveti sthitam /
GK16andhvc1u:3705: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
GK16andhvc1u:3716: vibhāvānubhāvapratipādake hi vākye tātparyaśaktirbhede saṃsarge vā paryavasyet;
GK16andhvc1u:3717: na tu rasyamānatāsāre rase ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:3721: ivaśabdena vidyamāno 'pi kramo na saṃlakṣyata iti taddarśayati--agra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3725: sa eveti pratīyamānamātre 'pi prakrānte tṛtīya eva rasadhvaniriti mantavyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:3743: lakṣaṇanuktvā tasyātmatvapratipādikāyāḥ kārikāyāḥ kā saṅgatirityato vṛttānuvādapurassaraṃ tāṃ darśayati--evamityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:3755: locanam tena rasa eva vastuta ātmā,
GK16andhvc1u:3756: vastvalaṅkāradhvanī tu sarvathā rasaṃ pratiparyavasyete iti vācyādutkṛṣṭau tāvityabhiprāyeṇa 'dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātme'ti sāmānyenoktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3758: krauñcasya dvandvaviyogena sahacarīhananodbhūtena sāhacaryadhvaṃsanenotthito yaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvo nirapekṣabhāvatvādvipralambhaśṛṅgārocitaratisthāyibhāvādanya eva,
GK16andhvc1u:3783: krauñcetyādikaṃ vyākhyāya śokasya ślokatāprāptiṃ vivṛṇoti---sa evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3784: krauñce tātasya śokasya vāsanārūpeṇādikavau sthitasya śokasya cābhedabuddhikṛtamaikyaṃ vivakṣitvā sa evetyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3794_3: prāptaḥ-- mā niṣāda pratiṣṭāṃ tvaṃmagamaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3797: na tu muneḥ śoka iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3798: evaṃ hi sati tadduḥkhena so 'pi duḥkhita iti kṛtvā rasasyātmateti niravakāśaṃ bhavet /
GK16andhvc1u:3804: svasya carvayituścittasya yā dgutistanmayībhāvajanitā pulakādibhirlakṣyamāṇā tayā samāsvādyo manasānubhāvyaḥ sāraḥ prāṇo yasyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:3805: kathamātmabhūtasya rasasya bahiḥślokatayā pariṇāma iti śaṅkāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntenottaramāha---rasetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3814: na ca samayasavyapekṣapravṛttikasya śabdasya tadviṣayatvaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkāmanuvadan vyaṅgyatvena tadviṣayatvaṃ darśayati--samayānapekṣatve 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3816: loke hi vilāpapraśaṃsādayo vacanaprakārāḥ śokabahumānarūpāṃ cittavṛttiṃ vyañjayantītyuktarītyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3822: samucitā eva śabdādayo rasādīn vyañjayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3823: ādikaveḥ ślokatvamāgata ityevaṃ vyākhyāyādikaveḥ śoka ityanvayabhramaṃ nirasyati---na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3835: evamuktaprakāreṇa carvaṇocitaḥ śokasthāyibhāva evātmā yasya tathā bhūto yaḥ karuṇarasastasya vividhavācyavācakaracanāprapañjacāruṇaḥ kāvyasya sa evārthaḥ sārabhūtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3836: locanam eva kāvyasyātmā sārabhūtasvabhāvo 'paraśāvdavailakṣaṇyakārakaḥ etadevoktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe--'yāvatpūrṇo na caitena tāvannaiva vamatyamum' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3839: tena yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- śabdaprādhānyamāśritya tatra śāstraṃ pṛthagviduḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3846: vividhaṃ tattadabhivyañjanīyarasānuguṇyena vicitraṃ kṛtvā bālapriyā samuccalanaṃ bahiḥ prasaraṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya 'mā niṣāde'tyādiślokasya tasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3849: yato 'mā niṣāde'tyādikāvyaṃ karuṇarasasamuccalanasvarūpamataḥ kāvyasya rasa evātmeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3857: naiva vamati bahirbhāvamāpādya parāsvādanīyaṃ naiva karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:3859: kāvyarūpeṇa rasamudgiratīti rasavamanarūpasya kāvyasya rasarūpatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3860: svena vilikhite 'mā niṣāde'tyādau 'agama' ityaḍāgamasya “namāṅyoga' iti niṣedhaśaṅkāyāmupapattimāha--agama ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3877: vividhaṃ vācyavācakaracanāsu prapañjena cāru iti vigrahamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---tattadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3881: tathā cādikarvarvālmīkeḥ nihatasahacarīvirahakātarakrauñcākrandajanitaḥ śoka eva ślokatayā pariṇataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3882: locanam vācye vācake racanāyāṃ ca prapañcena yaccāru śabdārthālaṅkāraguṇayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3883: tena sarvatrāpi dhvananasadbhāve 'pi na tathā vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3886: yaduktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe---'sarvatra tarhi kāvyavyavahāraḥ syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3903: nanu nihatetyādiyathāśrutagranthena tadākrandajanito muneśśoka ityartha iva pagratīyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3907: nanu śokacarvaṇāto yadi śloka udbhūtastatpratīyamānaṃ vastu kāvyasyātmeti kuta ityāśaṅkyāha---śoko hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3909: śoke hi sthāyibhāve ye vibhāvānubhāvāstatsamucitā cittavṛttiścarvyamāṇātmā rasa ityaucityātsthāyino rasatāpattirityucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3910: prāksvasaṃviditaṃ paratrānumitaṃ ca cittavṛttijātaṃ bālapriyā pūrvaṃ tanniṣedha ityato vyācaṣṭe---carvaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3912: śoka ityasya vāsanārūpeṇa sthito muneḥ śoka ityarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3922: 'śokaḥ śloktvamāgataḥ' iti śokacarvaṇātaḥ ślokotpattivacanenaiva rasasyātmavaṃ prakāśitameva śokacarvaṇāgocarātmatvātkaruṇarasasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3923: nanu kathamanyacarvaṇāyā anyo viṣayaḥ syādityata upapādayatiśoke hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3928: śokādernimittabhūtā ye vibhāvāḥ kāryabhūtā ye anubhavāścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3947: svānubhavasaṃskāraṃ svānumānasaṃskāraṃ cādhāya tābhyāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādamādadhānaṃ sadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3950: locanam saṃskārakrameṇa hṛdayasaṃvādamāda dhānaṃ carvaṇāyāmupayujyate yataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3951: nanu pratīyamānarūpamātmā tatra tribhedaṃ pratipāditaṃ na tu rasaikarūpam,
GK16andhvc1u:3954: bhāvagrahaṇena vyabhicāriṇo 'pi carvyamāṇasya tāvanmātrāviśrāntāvapi sthāyicarvaṇāparyavasānocitarasapratiṣṭāmanavāpyāpi prāṇatvaṃ bhavatītyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3955: yathā--- nakhaṃ nakhāgrema vighaṭṭayantī vivartayantī valayaṃ vilolam /
GK16andhvc1u:3978: stāyicarvaṇāyāṃ yatparyavasānaṃ tatpūrṇatākaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadeva ucitarasapratiṣṭā tāmaprāpyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3984_1: cābhivyajyamānāyā lajjāyāḥ śṛṅgāraniṣṭāmanavāpya carvaṇāgocarībhavantyāḥ prāṇatvamityāha--atra lajjāyā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3997: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:4000: sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:4002_0: tat vastutattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī alokasāmānyaṃ locanam evamitihāsamukhena
GK16andhvc1u:4006: yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- vāgdhenurdugdha etaṃ hi rasaṃ yadbālatṛṣṇāyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4007: bālapriyā athedamālocanīyaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ---śrīvālmīkinā “mā niṣāde“tyādiślokena ślokāntaraiśca sahacarasya puṃsa eva krauñcasya nihananaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
GK16andhvc1u:4009: sahacarīhananodbhūtene'ti 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' iti ca vyākhyānena locanakṛtā,
GK16andhvc1u:4011: atra kecit--'nihate'tyādivṛttigranthasya 'nihataḥ sahacarīvirahakātaraḥ svata eva sahacarīvirahāsahiṣṇuśca yaḥ krauñca
GK16andhvc1u:4014: 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' ityasya “nihatasahacarī“tyādigranthena vibhāvaḥ pradarśita ityarthaśceti na rāmāyaṇavacanavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4040: bālatṛṣṇayā locanam tena nāsya ramaḥ sa syādduhyate yogibhirhi yaḥ // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4042: ata eva--- yaṃ sarvaśaulāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16andhvc1u:4053: tena tasmāddhetoḥ saḥ asya bālatṛṣṇayā prasnatasya rasasya,
GK16andhvc1u:4063: ata eva yato rasaparipūrṇāyāstadāveśaparavaśāyā dhenoḥ prasnavanaṃ prati svayaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:4064: hibhavataḥ vatsarūpasyeti yāvat. 'ata eva ityanena himavataḥ sārāgṣapātratvamuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4075_1: pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaṃ karotīti kārikārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4083: yenāsminnativicitrakaviparamparāvāhini saṃsāre kālidāsaprabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahākavaya iti gaṇyante /
GK16andhvc1u:4087: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
GK16andhvc1u:4092: yadi ca vācyarūpa locanam yadāha muniḥ---'kaverantargataṃ bhāvaṃ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4094: abhivyaktena sphuratā pratibhāviśeṣeṇa nimittena mahākavitvagaṇaneti yāvat // .6 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4099_0: vedyata bālapriyā rasāveśasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ yadvaiśadyaṃ rasāveśānabhimukhatvarāhityaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4103: abivyaktena ata eva sphuratā pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:4110: tathā ca kārikā evāsāvarthaḥ syāttadvācyavāṭacakarūpaparijñānādeva tatpratītiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4111: atha ca vācyavācakalakṣaṇamātrakṛtaśramāṇāṃ kāvyatattvārthabhāvanāvimukhānāṃ svaraśrutyādilakṣaṇamivāpragītānāṃ gāndharvalakṣaṇavidāmagocara evāsāvarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4115: kāvyasya tattvabhūto yo 'rthastasya bhāvanā vācyātirekeṇānavaratacarvaṇā tatra vimukhānām /
GK16andhvc1u:4117: śrutirnāma śabdasya vailakṣaṇyamātrakāri yadrūpāntaraṃ tatparimāṇā svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitā dvāviśatividhā /
GK16andhvc1u:4121: nyaṅgyārthabodhe tu sahṛdayatvādirūpā ca sāmagrī pūrvottarārdhābhyāṃ darśitā ceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4122: vedane siddhe tatsāmagrīcintāvakāśa ityāśyena punarapi vedyata ityuktam,
GK16andhvc1u:4135: kārikāyāṃ 'sa hī'tyatra sa tviti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4142: gītādiśabdaśravaṇe sati tasya śabdasya yadrūpāntaraṃ lavādikālāṃśaṃ nimittīkṛtya jāyate tadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4144: tat parimāmaṃ kālapramāṇaṃ yasyāḥ setyarthaḥ. tanmātrakāleti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:4146: svaraḥ tasya svarasyāntarālamubhayamarthātpārśvadvayaṃ ca teṣāṃ yo bhedastatkalpitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4153: śravaṇārthasya dhātoḥ ktin pratyaye śrūyanta iti vyutpattyā śrūtiśabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4154: atra nādāparaparyāyaśrutivibhāgaviṣaye bahavaḥ prakārā varttante---kecana dvāviṃśatiṃ śrutīrmanyante,
GK16andhvc1u:4157: ata evoktaṃ kohalena--- dvāviṃśatiṃ kecidudāharanti śrutīḥ śrutijñānavicāradakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4161_0: etāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ mitho bhedaḥ--viṇādaṇḍe pūrvottarabāvena dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpya
GK16andhvc1u:4163: svataḥ sahakārikāraṇanirapekṣaṃ rañjayati śrotṛcittamanuraktaṃ karotīti svaraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4165: saptānāmapyamīṣāṃ svarāṇāṃ vyastānāṃ satāṃ dṛṣṭāddaṣṭaphalaupayikatvaṃ na bhavatīti tatsiddhaye grāmasyāvaśyakatā jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4171: tatraikasman vīṇādaṇḍe dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpaya āditasturīyāyāṃ tantryāṃ ṣaṅjasvaraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4177: dvāviṃśyāṃ niṣādaśceti svareṣu vinyasteṣu ṣaṅjagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4185: dvāviśyāṃ gāndhāraśceti vinyasteṣu svareṣu madhyamagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4192: niṣādagandhārau dvābhyāmutpannāvita dvaigrāmikyo dvāviṃśyaḥ śrutayaḥ svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitāḥ siddhāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4203: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati--- locanam mārgā gṛhyante /
GK16andhvc1u:4204: prakṛṣṭaṃ gītaṃ gānaṃ yeṣāṃ te pragītāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4217: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //
GK16andhvc1u:4225: sarvo hi tathā yatate itīyatā prādhānye lokasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4227: pratyabhijñeyaśabdenedamāha--- 'kāvyaṃ tu jātu jāyeta kasthacitpratibhāvataḥ' iti nayena yadyapi svayamasyaitatparisphurati,
GK16andhvc1u:4241: 'sahṛdayaiḥ so 'rthaḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdasca mahākavestau śabdārtho yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4243: etau mahākaveḥ tau tāddaśau śabdārthāvityākārakasahṛdayapratyabhijñānārhāvityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4244: atha tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvityarthāntaraṃ ca grāhyamityāha---niyogetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4269: locanam yathoktamasmatparamagurubhiḥ śrīmadutpalapādaiḥ-- taistairapyupayācitairupanatastanvyāḥ sthito 'pyantike kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
GK16andhvc1u:4270: lokasyaiṣa tathānavekṣitaguṇaḥ svātmāpi viśveśvaro naivālaṃ nijavaibhavāya tadiyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā ḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4276: evaṃ vyaṅgyasyārthasya vyañjakasya śabdasya ca prādhānyaṃ vadatā vyaṅkyavyañjakabhāvasyāpi bālapriyā taistairiti /
GK16andhvc1u:4277: sāmānyato 'vagatasyāpīśvarasya viśeṣato 'vagamamantareṇa na phalaparyantībhāvalābha ityartapradarśanaparo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4282: evamaparijñātaḥ yo mayā lokottarasaundaryādiguṇaviśiṣṭatvena śrutastata eva rāgātiśayena prarthitasca sa kānto 'yamiti viśeṣeṇājñātaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4292: tasmāt svataḥ sphuritayorapi śabdārthayoḥ mahākavinā yuktameva pratyabhijñānakaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4293: tarhi ko 'tra pratyabhijñāpadārtha ityata uktaphalatayā tatsvrūpamāha---tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4296: vṛttau 'mahākavestau śabdārthau sahṛdayaiḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4297: mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñetyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4303: dhvaniriti idānīṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yadvācyavācakāveva prathamamupādadate kavayastadapi yuktamevetyāha--
GK16andhvc1u:4306: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
GK16andhvc1u:4310: yathā hyālokārthī sannapi dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjano bhavati tadupāyatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:4312: tadvadyvaṅgyamarthaṃ pratyāddato jano vācye 'rthe yatnavān bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4313: locanam prādhānyamuktamiti dhvanati dhvanyate dhvananamiti tritayamapyupapannamityuktam // .8 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4315_1: prathamamupādānaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyema viruddho 'yaṃ prādhānye sādhye heturiti darśayati--idānīmityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:4324: prathamopādīyamānatvahetoḥ ko doṣa ityataḥ so 'pi darśita ityāha---upāyānāmevetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4333: anena pratipādakasya kavervyaṅgyamarthaṃ prati vyāpāro darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4341: yathā hi padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamastathā vācyārthapratītipūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4344: anena ślokenātyantasahṛdayo yo na bhavati tasyaiṣa sphuṭasaṃvedya eva kramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4345: yathātyantaśabdavṛttajño yo na bhavati tasya padārthavākyārthakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4346: kāṣṭāprāptasahṛdayabhāvasta tu vākyavṛttakuśalasyeva sannapi kramo 'bhyastānumānāvinābhāvasmṛtyādivadasaṃvedya iti darśitam // .10 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4374: abhyaste viṣaye anumānamanumitiḥ avinābhāvasmṛtiḥ vyāptismṛtiḥ tayoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4377: idānīṃ vācyārthapratītipūrvakatve 'pi tatpratītervyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati---
GK16andhvc1u:4380: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
GK16andhvc1u:4385: prādhānyādeva tatparyantānusaraṇaraṇaraṇakatvaritā madhye viśrānti na kurvata iti kramasya sāto 'pyalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānye hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4398: tatra raṇaraṇakena autsukyena tvaritāḥ santa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4402: tathā ca kā kathā kramaparyālocanāyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4405: 'svasāmarthye'tyasya svasya padārthasya yat sāmarthyaṃ sahakārītyarthābhiprāyeṇa vivṛṇoti--ākāṅkṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4406: kārikāyāṃ 'vyāpāraniṣpattā'viti svavyāpārasya vākyārthapratipādanarūpasya niṣpattau satyāṃ vākyārthabuddhāvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4410: vibhāvanamātraniṣedhena yathā svasāmarthyavaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayannapi padārtho vyāpāraniṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:4418: anena vidyamāna eva kramo na saṃvedyata ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4419: tena yatsphoṭābhiprāyeṇāsanneva krama iti vyācakṣate tatpratyuta viruddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:4420: vācye 'rthe vimukho viśrāntinibandhanaṃ paritoṣamalabhamāna ātmā hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmityanena sacetasāmityasyaivārtho 'bhivyaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4422: na tu kāvyasyāsau kaścidatiśaya ityāśaṅkyāha-avabhāsata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4425: ata eva tṛtīyoddyote ghaṭapradīpaddaṣṭāntabalādvyaṅgyapratītikāle 'pi vācyapratītirna vighaṭata iti yadvakṣyati tena sahāsya granthasya na virodhaḥ // 11// ,12 //
GK16andhvc1u:4444: tarhyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tadbuddhereva taddhetutvātsahṛdayānāmeva lorottaraḥ kaścidatiśayo 'yaṃ na kāvyasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4457: na bhāsata iti vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti śeṣaḥ ;
GK16andhvc1u:4462: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayannāha---
GK16andhvc1u:4464: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
GK16andhvc1u:4465: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
GK16andhvc1u:4468: vyaṅktaḥ kāvyaviśeṣaḥ sa dhvaniriti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:4481: 'sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu' bālapriyā na virodha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4493: vyaṅgyasya sadbhāve siddhavi siddha eva tamarithamiti tatpadena parāmarśo yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4498: yatrārtho vācyaviśeṣaḥ vācakaviśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tamarthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4500: anena vācyavācakacārutvahetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaśca locanam iti yaduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4502: vyaṅkta iti dvivacanenadamāha--yadyapyavivakṣitavācye śabda eva vyañjakastathāpyarthasyāpi sahakāritā na truṭyati,
GK16andhvc1u:4505: viśiṣṭaśabdābhidheyatayā vinā tasyārthasyāvyañjakatvāditi sarvatra śabdārthayorubhayorapi dhvananaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4507: arthaḥ śabdo veti tu vikalpābhidhānaṃ prādhānyābhiprāyema /
GK16andhvc1u:4508: kāvyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaścāsau kāvyasya vā viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4510: bālapriyā nanvekaikatra śabdārthayorekaikasyaiva vyañjakatvāt vyaṅkta iti dvivacanamanupapannamityata āha--dvivacanenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4517: yathā gajasyākṣinimīlanaṃ na buddhipūrvakamapi tu svabhāvata evetyavicāro gajanimīlikāśabdena lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4518: nanu yadi samuccayastarhi 'arthaśabdāvi'ti bhāvyamityata āha--artha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4521: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---vākāro 'tra śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanakriyākarttṛtve vikalpasya na bodhakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4522: yena “śiraśśvā kāko vā dgupadatanayo vā parimṛśe“dityādāvivaikavacanaṃ bhavet,
GK16andhvc1u:4523: āpi tu vyañjanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtvenānvitayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanaprādhānye vikalpamavagamayati /
GK16andhvc1u:4524: tathā ca vikalpitavyañjanaprādhānyau śabdārthau vyaṅkta iti vākyārtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4528: 'yo dhvanilakṣaṇa ātmā sa tathāvidhaśabdārthapṛṣṭapātīti kāvyagrahaṇāduktam' iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4531: yaccoktam--'cārutvapratītistarhi kāvyasyātmā syāt' iti tadaṅgīkurma eva /
GK16andhvc1u:4533: yaccoktam---'cāruṇaḥ pratītiryadi kāvyātmā pratyakṣādipramāṇādapi sā bhavantī tathā syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4534: tatra śabdārthamayakāvyātmābhidhānaprastāve ka eṣa prasaṅga iti na kiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc1u:4536: artho vā śabdo vā, vyāpāro vā /
GK16andhvc1u:4539: vyaṅgyo vā dhvanyata iti vyāpāro vā bālapriyā teneti /
GK16andhvc1u:4542: 'pono devadatto divā na bhuṅkta' ityādau rātribhojanādergamyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4544: yadi cārutvahetutayā prāsiddhebhyo guṇādibhyo 'nyaḥ kāvyātmā syāttarhi cārutvapratītireva tadātmāstu,
GK16andhvc1u:4545: tasyāḥ dṛṣṭatvenāddaṣṭavastvantarakalpane gauravāditi tadatirikto na dhvanirityākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4548: cārutvapratītirityasya cārutvapratīterviṣayo heturvā kaścidguṇādibhyo 'nya ityarthasya vaktavyatayā dhvanināmnyena vivāda ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4571: yato lakṣaṇakṛtāmeva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4572: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāri kāvyatattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:4574: kārikayā tu prādhānyena samudāya eva kāvyarūpo mukhyatayā dhvaniriti pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:4587: tathāca saḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdavācyavyaṅgyavyañjanasamudāyātmakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniriti kathitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4599: uktārthopapādanāya 'viśeṣeṇa sinoti badhnāti svasambandhinaṃ padārtham' iti vyutpattimabhipretya viṣayaśabdasyārthamāha--ananyatra bhāva iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4604: lakṣaṇapratipādanenaiva prathamābhāvavādimataṃ nirākṛtamityabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛto 'yadapyuktam' ityādinā dvitīyābhāvavādimatadūṣaṇābhidhānamiti pradarśayitumāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4608_0: ghnanirnāma kāvyaprakāro na kāvyaśabdavācyaḥ prasiddhaprasthānātikrāmitvāditi paramatasya
GK16andhvc1u:4608_2: vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpamabhipretya yata ityādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitamiti vyācaṣṭe---lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4615: vācyavācakamātrāśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgyavyañjakasamāśrayema vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ kathamantarbhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4633: bālapriyā guṇādivyatiriktasya tasya nṛttādiprāyatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirākaroti--yaccetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4640: gauṇo vā kāvyasya citrapadena vyavahāra ityāha--kāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4643: viṣṇavādyanukāritvamālekhyamātratvaṃ kalārūpatvaṃ ca lokaprasiddhacitrāṇāmastīti tadyogātkāvye citraśabdapravṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4654: nanu yatra pratiyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūddhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4660: guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaramabhivyanakti sa dhvaniriti /
GK16andhvc1u:4665: abhihitamiti bhūtaprayoga ādau vyaṅkta ityasya vyākhyātatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4670: prādhānyaṃ ca yadyapi jñaptau na cakāsti;
GK16andhvc1u:4672: tathāpi vivecakairjīvitānveṣaṇe kriyamāṇe yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ punarapi vācyamevānuprāṇayannāste tadā tadupakaraṇatvādeva tasyālaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc1u:4675: tathāpi madhyakakṣāniviṣṭo 'sau vyahgyo 'rtho bālapriyā kārikāyāmanuktasyādhikasyāpekṣitasyārthasyāvāpaḥ prakṣepaḥ taṃ kartumityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4685: tadrahito 'khaṇḍastāddaśasya vākyārthībhūtasya rasādivyaṅgyasya carvaṇāyāṃ viśrānteḥ sahṛdayamanasāṃ viśrānterityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4690: yaḥ pūrvaṃ vācyāduttīrmastadvyaṅgyatvātsakakṣyāntarahgato 'pi punaḥ pūrvabhāvirnī vācyakakṣyāṃ praviśya vācyamevānuprāṇayanyadā āste ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4703: yadā punarvyaṅgyo 'rtho vācyenopaskṛtaḥ kāvyamanuprāṇaṭayannāste tadā tasmāccamatkāralābha ityanenārthāt sidhyati /
GK16andhvc1u:4707: samāsoktau tāvat---- upoḍharāgema vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
GK16andhvc1u:4708: yathā samastaṃ timiśaṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16andhvc1u:4709: ityāda.u vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyameva prādhānyena pratīyate locanam na rasonmukhībhavati;
GK16andhvc1u:4710: svātantryeṇāpi tu vācyamevārtha saṃskartuṃ dhāvatīti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatokta /
GK16andhvc1u:4714: ityatra samāsokterlakṣaṇasvarūpaṃ hetirnāma tannirvacanamiti pādacatuṣṭayena kramāduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4725: rāgādraktatvāt sandhyākṛtādanantaraṃ premarūpācca bālapriyā prathamāvācyasya dvitīyā vastuvyaṅgyasya tṛtīyā rasadhvaneśca kakṣeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4731: atra niśāśaśivṛttāntaḥ prākāraṇikatvādvācyo nāyakavṛttāntastvaprākaraṇikatvādvyaṅgya ityabhipretya samānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ vivṛṇoti--upoḍha ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:4757: timirasaṃvalitāṃśudarśane hi rātrimukhamiti lokena lakṣyate na tu sphuṭa āloke /
GK16andhvc1u:4760: atra ca nāyakena paścādgatena cumbanopakrame puro nīlāṃśukasya galanaṃ patanam /
GK16andhvc1u:4761: yadi vā 'puro 'gre nāyakena tathā gṛhītaṃ mukham' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4763: tathāhi nāyakavyavahāro niśāśaśināveva śṛṅgāravibhāvarūpau saṃskurvāṇo 'laṅkāratāṃ bhajate,
GK16andhvc1u:4766: na cācetanāyāḥ kartṛtvamupapannamiti śabdenaivātra nāyakavyavahāra unnīto 'bhidhadheya eva,
GK16andhvc1u:4767: na vyaṅgya ityata eva samāsoktiḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4773: bālapriyā timirasya sūkṣmāṃśūnāṃ ca sammiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ karamatvasambhavāttayeti karaṇe tṛtīyetyāha---karaṇabhūtayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:4774: tanmiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ jñāpakatvarūpopalakṣaṇatvasambhavāt tayetyupalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā vetyāha-upalakṣaṇatvena veti /
GK16andhvc1u:4782: ata eva na labhitamiti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ bodhayitumāha---timiretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4796: evaṃ vyaṅgyasya guṇībhūtatvaṃ pradarśya rasāpekṣyā dhvanitvamapyastīti darśayintumāha--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4813: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgyaviseṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepoktisāmarthyādeva jñāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4814: tathāhi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣeṣa locanam gamyata iti cānenābhidhāvyāpāranirāsādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:4815: nāyikāyā nāyake yo vyavahāraḥ sa niśāyāṃ samāropitaḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:4816: nāyikāyāṃ nāyakasya yo vyavahāraḥ sa śaśini samāropita iti vyākhyāne naikaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4820: tatrādya.u yathā--- ahaṃ tvāṃ yadi nekṣeya kṣaṇamapyutsukā tataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4822: bālapriyā ityuktyanuguṇatayā rājahaṃsānāṃ cāmaratvaṃ śaradaścāmaragrāhiṇītvaṃ cārthāt sidhyati,
GK16andhvc1u:4823: tathā prakṛte timirāṃśukapadānuguṇatayā niśādernāyikātvādikamata ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4836: evaṃ samāsoktau vyaṅgyopaskṛtaṃ vācyameva pradhānamatastatra dhvanilakṣaṇasya nātivyāptiriti pradarśyākṣepe 'pi sa eva prakāra ityāha vṛtto-'ākṣepe 'pī' tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4849: pratiṣedha iva locanam iti vakṣyamāṇamaraṇaviṣayo niṣedhātmākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4851: uktaviṣayastu yathā mamaiva--- bho bhoḥ kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patitastvaṃ pāntha kānyā gatiḥ tattāddaktṛṣitasya me khalamatiḥ so 'yaṃ jalaṃ gūhate /
GK16andhvc1u:4852: asthānopanatāmakālasulabhāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ prati krudhya bhoḥ trailokyaprathitaprabhāvamihimā mārgaḥ punarmāravaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4861: utsukāhaṃ tvāṃ kṣaṇamapi na tar ikṣeya yadi,
GK16andhvc1u:4862: tataḥ tarhi iyadetāvat yadiparyantaṃ vacanameva astu /
GK16andhvc1u:4879: bho bho iti vīpsayā bodhanīyaṃ pratyādarātiśayo dyotyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4882: kiṃ kiṃ patitaḥ atrāgamanena etatsevanena cābhimataṃ phalaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4884: cirasevinā kenacidevamukte pānthaḥ kiñcit kupita āha---kānyetyādi khaletyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:4886: tattādṛgatiśayena tṛṣitasya tṛṣā jalapipāsā dhanalipsā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4894: 'khalamatisso 'yam' iti pāṭhe tu so 'yamiti māravamārgaṃ prabhuṃ coddiśyoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4897: akālasulabhāṃ yadā viṣayasya sulabhatvaṃ tadā tṛṣṇā na bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:4899: tṛṣṇāṃ prati tava tṛṣṇāyai krudhya na māṃ pratīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4904: locanam atra kaścitsevakaḥ prāptaḥ prāptavyamasmātkimiti na labha iti pratyāśāviśasyamānahṛdayaḥ kenacidamunākṣepeṇa pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4909: yathā--- tasyāstanmukhamasti saumyasubhagaṃ kiṃ pārvaṇenenḍhunā saundaryasya padaṃ dṛśau yadi ca taiḥ kiṃ nāma nīlotpalaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4918: na labhe iti vitarkānantarajātayā pratyāśayā pratikṣaṇotpannayā āśayā viśasyamānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yasya sa iti pratibodhane hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4920: amunā ākṣepeṇa asatpuruṣasevātadvaiphalyādirūpavyaṅgyaviśeṣapratipipādayiṣayā kṛtena kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita iti niṣedharūpeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:4938: kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita itīṣṭapatanaphalaniṣedharūpākṣepemākṣepyaṃ yadasatpuruṣasevāvaiphalyādi tenālaṅkṛtamākṣepakaṃ tadvācyameva pradhānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4939: “prāṇā yena samarpitā” ityādivadatrāprastutapraśaṃsāpyastīti tatsaṅkīrṇo 'yamākṣepa ityapi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4956: rūpo ya ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgyaviśeṣamākṣipanmukhyaṃ kāvyaśarīram /
GK16andhvc1u:4959: locanam kiṃ vā komalakāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ satyeva tatrādhare hī dhātuḥ punaruktavasturacanārambheṣvapūrvā grahaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4961: kiṃ tena kṛtyamiti tvapahastanārūpa ākṣepo vācya eva camatkārakāraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:4970: punaruktānāmanupādeyānāṃ niṣphalānāṃ vastūnāṃ pārvaṇacandrādīnāṃ racanāyāṃ sṛṣṭau viṣaye ye ārambhā vyāpārāḥ teṣu /
GK16andhvc1u:4977: 'iti vācya ākṣepa eva camatkārakāraṇam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4985: śaratkāle hi candrasya prasādātiśayo ravitāpādhikyaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4992: nāyikāpakṣe nakhakṣatasthatayā śrutamapyupamānatvamaindre dhanuṣiyojanīyamindracāpābhaṃ nakakṣataṃ dadhānetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5002: tatpurassaraḥ tasyāḥsa purassaraḥ pūrvakāle sammukhaṃ ca saranniti dvayorarthayoradhyavasāyenaikyaṃ bodhyamata evāho ityādeparupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5005: ddaṣṭāntoktitayā aho daivagatiḥ kīddaktathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5006: atra satyāmapi vyaṅgyapratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvamutkarṣavaditi tasyaiva prādhānyavivakṣā /
GK16andhvc1u:5007: yathā ca dīpakāpahnutyādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāvapi prādhānyenāvivikṣitatvānna tayā vyapadeśastadvadatrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5014: bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa tu samāsoktirityamumāśayaṃ hṛdaye gṛhītvā samāsoktyakṣepayoḥ yuktyedamekamevodāharaṇaṃ vyataradgranthakṛt /
GK16andhvc1u:5017: sarvathālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyaṃ vācye guṇībhavatīti naḥ sādhyamityatrāśayo 'tra granthe 'smadgurubhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5018: evaṃ prādhānyavivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntamuktvā vyapadeśo 'pi prādhānyakṛta eva bhavatītyatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ svaparaprasiddhamāha---yathā ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5022: dīpake hi 'ādimadhyāntaviṣayaṃ tridhā dīpakamiṣyate' iti lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5023: maṇiḥ śāṇollīḍhaḥ samaravijayī hetidalitaḥ kalāśeṣaścandra suratamṛditā bālalanā /
GK16andhvc1u:5024: madakṣīṇo nāgaḥ śaradi saridāśyānapulinā tanimnā śobhante galitavibhavāścārthiṣu janāḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5045: yathā--- neyaṃ virauti bhṛṅgālī madena mukharā muhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5051: yathā--- sa ekastrīṇi jayati jaganti kusumāyudhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5052: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam //
GK16andhvc1u:5054: uktanimittāyāmapi vastusvabhāvamātratve paryavasānamiti tatrāpi na vyaṅgyasadbhāvaśaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:5055: yathā--- karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimānyo jane jane /
GK16andhvc1u:5094: yasmādukte prakāradvaye vyaṅyasadbhāvo anuktanimittāyāmapi viśeṣoktau---- āhūto 'pi sahāyaiḥ omityuktvā vimuktanidro 'pi /
GK16andhvc1u:5095: gantumanā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
GK16andhvc1u:5097: na tu tatpratītinimittā locanam tena prakāradvayamavadhīrya tṛtīyaṃ prakāramāśaṅkate--anuktanimittāyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc1u:5101_0: yattu rasikairapi nimittaṃ kalpitam-'kāntāsamāgame gamanādapi laghutaramupāyaṃ svapnaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5101_1: manyamāno nidrāgamabuddhyā saṅkocaṃ nātyajat' iti tadapi nimittaṃ cārutvahetutayā
GK16andhvc1u:5102: api tu viśeṣoktibhāga eva na śithilayatītyevambhūto 'bhivyajyamānanimittopaskṛtaścārutvahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5104: evamabhiprāyadvayamapi sādhāraṇoktyā granthakṛnnyarūpayanna tvaudbhaṭenaivābhiprāyeṇa grantho vyavasthita iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5144: paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ tadbhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāvantarbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5147: locanam atra bhīṣmasya bhārgavaprabhāvabhibhāvī prabhāva iti yadyapi pratīyate,
GK16andhvc1u:5149: ata eva paryāyeṇa prakārāntareṇāvagamātmanā vyaṅgyenopalakṣitaṃ sadyadabhidhīyate tadabhidhīyamānamuktameva satparyāyoktamityabhidhīyata itilakṣaṇapadam,
GK16andhvc1u:5152: yadi tvabhidhīyata ityasya balādyvakhyānamabhidhīyate pratīyate pradānatayeti,
GK16andhvc1u:5168: 'ata eva iti sarvaṃ yujyata' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5169: vyaṅgyasya prādhānye sarvametadanupapannaṃ bhavedato vācyasyaiva prādhānyamabhyupeyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5181: anena lakṣaṇavākyenaiva vyaṅgyānugatasya vācyasya prādhānyaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5198: prādhānavyaṅgyānāṃ na punaḥ paryāyokte bhāmahodāhṛtasaddaśe vyaṅgyasyaiva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5200: apahnutidīpakayoḥ punarvācyasya locanam yāddaśo 'laṅkāratvena vivakṣitastāddaśe dhvanirnāntarbhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:5208: na ceyadapi prāktanairddaṣṭamapi tvasmābhirevonmīlitamiti darśayati-na punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:5209: bhāmahasya yāddaktadīyaṃ rūpabhimataṃ tāddagudāharaṇena darśatam. tatrāpi naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ cārutvāhetutvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5210: tena tadanusāritayā tatsaddaśaṃ yadudāharaṇāntaramapi kalpyate tatra naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamiti saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5213: kevalaṃ tu nayamanavalambyāpaśravamenātmasaṃskāra ityanāryaceṣṭitam. yadāhuraitihā sikāḥ---'avajñayāpyavacchādya śṛṇvannarakamṛcchati' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5214: bhāmahena hyudāhṛtam--- 'guheṣvadhvasu vā nānnaṃ bhuñjmahe yadadhītinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5229: mātsaryagrahaṇātkevalaṃ paryāyoktavācā ayamasmannaya evāvalambyata iti yojanā /
