GK16andhvc1u:5245: 'adhītinaḥ viprāḥ yadannaṃ na bhuñjate vayaṃ gṛheṣvadhvasu vā tadannaṃ na prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:5247: locanam etaddhi bhagavadvāsudevavacanaṃ paryāyema rasadānaṃ niṣedhati /
GK16andhvc1u:5249: na cāsya rasadānaniṣedhasya vyaṅgyasya kiñciccārutvamasti yena prādhānyaṃ śaṅgyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:5250: api tu tadyvaṅgyopodbalitaṃ viprabhojanena vinā yannabhojanaṃ tadevoktaprakāreṇa paryāyoktaṃ satprākaraṇikaṃ bhojanārthamalaṅkurute /
GK16andhvc1u:5251: na hyasya nirviṣaṃ bhojanaṃ bhavatviti vivakṣitamiti paryāyoktamalaṅkāra eveti cirantanānāmabhimata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5256_0: pūrvaṃ caitadupamādivyapadeśabhājanameva tadyathā na bhavatītyamuyā chāyayā dṛṣṭāntatayoktamapyuddeśakramapūraṇāya
GK16andhvc1u:5257: chāyāntarema vastu punarekamevopamāyā eva vyaṅgyatvena dhvanitvāśaṅkanāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5258: yattu vivaraṇakṛt---dīpakasya sarvatropamānvayo nāstīti bahunodāharaṇaprapañcenavicāritavāṃstadanupayogi nissāraṃ supratikṣepaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5268: bhojanaṃ nirviṣaṃ bhavatviti vā bhagavato 'bhiprāyassahṛdayānāṃ vyaṅgyo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5280: na vivakṣitaṃ caidyaṃ prata na bubodhayiṣitam /
GK16andhvc1u:5283: tīpakāpahnutyādāviti pūrvoktasyaivādyakathanena paunarukatyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ svarūpaikye 'pi prakārabhedānna paunaruktyamityāha---pūrvamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5294: locanam sa priyāsaṅgamotkaṇṭhāṃ sāsahyāṃ manasaḥ śucam //
GK16andhvc1u:5298: tathā hi--- rāma iva daśaratho 'bhūddaśaratha iva radhurajo 'pi radhusaddaśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5301: tasmātkramikatvaṃ samaṃ vā prākaraṇikatvamupamāṃ niruṃṇaddhīti ko 'yaṃ trāsa itlaṃ gardabhīdohānuvartanena /
GK16andhvc1u:5304: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṅkaraḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5309_0: atra śaśī vadanamasyāḥ tadvadvā vadanamasyā iti rūpakopamollekhādyugapaddvayāsambhavādekatarapakṣatyāgagrahaṇe
GK16andhvc1u:5310: yo 'pi dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ---śabdārthālaṅkārāmāmekatrabhāva iti tatrāpi pratīyamānasya kā śaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:5311: yathā--smara smaramiva priyaṃ ramayase yamāliṅganāt iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5336: ko vyaṅgyaḥ ko vācya ityaniścayādvyaṅgyaprādānyakṛtadhvanitvasambhāvanāpi locanam atraiva yamakamupamā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5337: tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ-- yatraikatra vākyāṃśe 'neko 'rthālaṅkārastatrāpi dvayoḥ sāmyātkasya vyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:5349: tayā gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhyastato gahītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5361: svāmino vipattau satyāṃ samucitaṃ yadvratagrahaṇa tatra hevākī udyuktaḥ yaḥ kulaputrakaḥ tadrūpaṇaṃ vāsaraviṣayakaṃ karma /
GK16andhvc1u:5363: bhāsvatassvāmitvamatastadgamanasya vipattitvaṃ guhānivāsasya vratagrahamatvaṃ tatpraveśasya tadarthavyāpāratvañca tamoguhāmiti śābdena rūpakeṇa gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5375: atha vācyopasarjanībhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ tadā locanam tadāha-yadālaṅkāra ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5378: ādye tu prakāre 'śaśivadane'tyādyudāhṛte kathañcidasti sambhāvanetyāśacaṅkya nirākaroti---alaṅkāradvayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:5381: nanu yatra vyaṅgyameva prādhānyena bhāti tatra kiṃ kartavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5382: yathā--- hīi ṇa guṇāṇurāo khalāṇaṃ ṇavaraṃ pasiddhisaraṇāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5383: kira pahiṇusai sasimaṇaṃ cande piāmuhe diṭṭhe //
GK16andhvc1u:5387: saṅkarālaṅkāra bālapriyā asmiṃścaturthe bhede dhvanyabhāvaparatayā vṛttigranthamavatārayati---tadāheti /
GK16andhvc1u:5394: bhavati na guṇānurāgaḥ khalānāṃ kevalaṃ prasiddhiśaraṇānām /
GK16andhvc1u:5395: kila prasnaiti śaśimaṇiḥ candre na priyāmukhe dṛṣṭe //
GK16andhvc1u:5403: yadi śasimaṇergumānurāgassyāttadā priyāmukhadarśane kathaṃ na niḥṣyandeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5405: candraḥ priyāmukhameva candra ityarthasya khyāpanādapahnutiśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5410: na tu sa eva dhvaniriti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5412: api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktireva locanam evāyaṃ na bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:5415: atha sarveṣu saṅkaraprabhedeṣu vyaṅgyasambhāvanānirāsaprakāraṃ sādhāraṇamāha---api ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5425: tatra prathame prakāradvaye prastutāprastutayostulyameva prādhānyamiti pratijñāṃ karoti-aprastutetyādinā prādhānyamityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:5427: gamyate tu prākaraṇiko viśeṣaḥ sa ekaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5430: atra hi daivaprādhānyaṃ sarvatra sāmānyarūpamaprastutaṃ varṇitaṃ satprakṛte vastuni kvāpi vinaṣṭe viśeṣātmani paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc1u:5433: yadā tu viseṣo 'prākaramikaḥ prākaraṇikaṃ sāmānyamākṣipati tadā dvitīyaḥ bālapriyā tatkathamityatrāha--saṅkīrṇateti /
GK16andhvc1u:5457_1: sambandhastadā viśeṣapratītau satyāmapi prādhānyena tatsāmānyenāvinābhāvātsāmānyasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5458: yadāpi viśeṣasya sāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ tadāpi sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmanye sarvaviśeṣāṇāmantarbhāvādviśeṣasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5460: yathā--- etattasya mukhātkiyattakamalinīpattre kaṇaṃ pārthaso yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16andhvc1u:5461: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanai. statroṅḍīya gato hahetyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥ śucā //
GK16andhvc1u:5463: prastutaṃ tu jalabindau maṇitvasambhāvanaṃ viśeṣarūpaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5467: etameva nyāyaṃ nimittanaimittikabhāve 'tidiśaṃstasyāpi dviprakāratāṃ bālapriyā viśeṣaprādhānyanāntarīyakatvaṃ sāmānyaprādhānyasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5469: yathā 'raktaṃ paṭaṃ vaye'tyādau dvayostrayāṇaṃ vā vidhirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5475: muktāmaṇirityamasta yat etattasya jaḍasya kiyat vakṣyamāṇāpekṣayā atyalpamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5487: ādīyamāne aṅgulyagrasya laghukriyayā alpacācalanena pravlayini aṅguloveva lagra ityarthastathā sati /
GK16andhvc1u:5490: tasyādarśinānmamāyaṃ muktāmaṇiḥ khamutpatya gata iti matvā antaḥśucā na nidrātītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5494: yathā----- ye yāntyabhyudaye prītiṃ nojjhanti vyasaneṣu ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5496: atrāprastuta.ṃ suhṛdbāndhavarūpatvaṃ nimitt sajjanāsaktyā varṇayati naimittikīṃ śraddheyavacanatāṃ prastutāmātmano 'bhivyaṅktum;
GK16andhvc1u:5497: yatra naimittikapratītāvapi nimittapratītireva pradhānībhavatyanuprāṇākatveneti vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5498: kadācittu nemititakamaprastutaṃ varṇyamānaṃ satprastutaṃ nimittaṃ vyanakti /
GK16andhvc1u:5507: yathāsmadupādhyāyabhaṭṭendurājasya---- prāṇā yena samarpitāstava balādyena tvamutthāpitaḥ skandhe yasya ciraṃ sthito 'si vidadhe yaste saparyāmapi /
GK16andhvc1u:5508: tasyāsya smitamātrakeṇa janayan prāṇāpahārakriyāṃ bhrātaḥ pratyupakāriṇāṃ dhuri paraṃ vetāla līlāyate //
GK16andhvc1u:5519: na hi vaktustathāvidhabāndhavatvādipratītiṃ vinā śraddheyavacanatvaṃ pratītipathamavatarediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5530: locanam atra yadyapi sārūpyavaśena kṛtadhnaḥ kaścidanyaḥ prastuta ākṣipyate,
GK16andhvc1u:5532: na hyacetanopālambhavadasambhāvyamāno 'yamartho na ca na hṛdya iti vācyasyātra pradhānatā /
GK16andhvc1u:5533: yadi punaracetanādinātyantāsambhāvyamānatadarthaviśeṣaṇenāprastutena varṇitena prastutamākṣipyamāṇaṃ camatkārakāri tadā vastudhvanirasau /
GK16andhvc1u:5534: yathā mamaiva---- bhāvavrāta haṭhājjanasya hṛdayānyākramya yannartayan bhaṅgībhirvividhābhirātmahṛdayaṃ pracchādya saṃkrīḍase /
GK16andhvc1u:5535: sa tvāmāha jaḍaṃ tataḥ sahṛdayammanyatvaduḥśikṣito manye 'muṣya jaḍātmatā stutipadaṃ tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt //
GK16andhvc1u:5536_2: lokena mūrkho 'yamiti yadavajñāyate tadā tadīyaṃ lokottaraṃ caritaṃ prastutaṃ bālapriyā
GK16andhvc1u:5547: atyantamasambhāvyamānāni tadarthasya aprastutārthasya viśeṣaṇāni yatra tena /
GK16andhvc1u:5551: bhāvānāṃ candrodyānādipadārthanāṃ vrātaḥ sārthaḥ he bhāva vrāta /
GK16andhvc1u:5558: yā jaḍātmatā jaḍo 'sītyucyamānatā sā tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt tvatsāmyāpātāddhetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5564: gāḍho yo viveka evālokaḥ tena tiraskṛtaṃ timirapratānaṃ mohāndhakārasamūho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5572: sa ca pratyuta kasyacidvirihiṇa autsukyacintādūyamānamānasatāmanyasya praharṣaparavaśatāṃ karotīti haṭhādeva lokaṃ yathecchaṃ vikārakāraṇābhirnartayati /
GK16andhvc1u:5573: na ca tasya hṛdayaṅkenāpi jñāyate kīdṛgayamiti,
GK16andhvc1u:5574: pratyuta mahāgambhīro 'tividagdhaḥ suṣṭugarvahīno 'tiśayena krīḍācaturaḥ sa yadi lokena jaḍa iti tata eva kāraṇātpratyuta vaidagdhyasambhāvananimittātsambhāvitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5575_0: ātmā ca yata eva kāraṇātpratyuta jāḍyena sambhāvyastata eva sahṛdayaḥ sambhāvitastadasya
GK16andhvc1u:5575_1: lokasya jaḍo 'sīti yadyucyate tadā jaḍyamevaṃvidhasya bhāvavrātasyāvidagdhasya prasiddhamiti
GK16andhvc1u:5579: itarathaiva punaralaṅkārāntaratvamalaṅkāraviśeṣatvaṃ na vyaṅgyasya kathañcidapi prādhānya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5580: uddeśe yadādigrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ samāsoktītyatra dvandve tena vyājastutiprabhṛtiralaṅkāravargo 'pi sambhāvyamānavyaṅgyānuveśaḥ sambhāvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5610: tathā sati tattulyayogakṣematayā janasyāpyajaḍatvasambhavājjanaṃ pratijaḍo 'sītyuktirvāstavī stutireva paryavasyediti /
GK16andhvc1u:5616: tadayamatra saṅkṣepaḥ---- locanam tatra sarvatra sādhāraṇamuttaraṃ dātumupakramate---tadayamatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:5618: tatra vyājastutiryathā--- kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ paragṛhagataiḥ kintu nāhaṃ samartha- stūṇīṃ sthātuṃ prakṛtimukharo dākṣiṇātyasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5619: gehe gehe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pānagoṣṭhyā- munmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5621: yattūdāhṛtaṃ kenacit---- āsīnnātha pitāmahī tava mahī jātā tato 'nantaraṃ mātā samprati sāmburāśiraśanā jāyā kulodbhūtaye /
GK16andhvc1u:5622: pūrṇe varṣaśate bhaviṣyati punaḥ saivānavadyā snuṣā yuktaṃ nāma samagranītividuṣāṃ kiṃ bhūpatīnāṃ kule //
GK16andhvc1u:5631: yasya cittavṛttiviśeṣasya sambandhī vāgvyāpārādirvikāro 'pratibandho niyataḥ bālapriyā punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:5634: aprastutavarṇanasthale yatra vācyasya aprastutārthasya camatkārakāritvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:5636: yatra tu prastutasya vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ tatra vastudhvanireva nālaṅkāra iti granthakārāśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5647: 'yasya vikārastu apratibandhaḥ prabhavan yena hetunā tamabhiprāyaṃ tatpratibandhaṃ ca gamayati asau bhāva ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5655: na dhvaniryatra vā tasya prādhānyaṃ na pratīyate //
GK16andhvc1u:5656: locanam prabhavaṃstaṃ cittavṛttiviśeṣarūpamabhiprāyaṃ yena hetunā gamayati sa heturyatheṣṭopabhogyatvādilakṣaṇo 'rtho bhāvālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5657: yathā--- ekākinī yadabalā taruṇī tathāhamasmingṛhe gṛhapatiśca gato videśam /
GK16andhvc1u:5658: kaṃ yācase tadiha vāsamiyaṃ varākī śvaśrūrmamāndhabadhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha //
GK16andhvc1u:5659: atra vyaṅgyamekaikatra padārthe upaskārakārīti vācyaṃ pradhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:5660: vyaṅgyaprādhānye tu na kācidalaṅkārateti nirūpitamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:5671: 'yena pratibaddhena' iti pāṭhe tu pratibaddhenetyasyokta evārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5673: kasyaciccittavṛttiviśeṣasya anubhāvo vyāpārādirvyaṅgyahetudvārā taccittavṛttiviśeṣasya gamakaḥ sa heturityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5675: ahaṃ tvayā yatheṣṭamupabhoktavyā na kiñcitpratibandhakamiti nāyikāmanogatādirarthaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5680: nanvasti khalu tava śvaśrūstāṃ yāca ityatrāha-iyamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5695: 'na pratīyata' tatparāveva śabdārthau yatra vyaṅgyaṃ prīta sthitau /
GK16andhvc1u:5696: dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayo mantavyaḥ saṅkarojjhitaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5706: tena caturṣu prakāreṣu na dhvanivyavahāraḥ sadbhāve 'pi vyaṅgyasya aprādhānye mliṣṭapratītau vācyena samaprādhānye 'sphuṭe prādhānye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5718: tadāpi na sa bālapriyā ityasya vyakhyānam--sphuṭatayā na cakāstīti /
GK16andhvc1u:5734: vṛttāvitaścetyatra itaḥ vakṣyamāṇaddhetorityarthaṃ manasikṛtya vyācaṣṭe---na kevalamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5739: nanvavayavātiriktāvayavino 'nupalambhānna cāvayava evāvayavīti tanniṣedho 'nupapanna iti śaṅkāmavayava ityekavacanārthasya vivakṣitatvaṃ darśayan pariharati---ekaika iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5750: yatrāpi vā tattvaṃ tatrāpi dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameva /
GK16andhvc1u:5762: nanvalaṅkāra eva kaścittvayā pradhānatābhiṣekaṃ dattvā dhvanirityātmeti cokta ityāśaṅkyāha---yatrāpi veti /
GK16andhvc1u:5763: na hi samāsoktyādīnāmanyatama evāsau tathāsmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5764: tadviviktatve 'pi tasya bhāvāt samāsoktyādyalaṅkārasvarūpasya samastasyābhāve 'pi tasya darśitatvāt 'attā ettha' iti 'kassa vā ṇa' ityādi;
GK16andhvc1u:5767: vidvadbhya upajñā prathama upakramo yatyā ukteriti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5774: eka eva na samudāyaḥ na samudāyarūpāvayavī /
GK16andhvc1u:5790: dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadvivṛṇoti locane---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5802: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvaniriti vyavaharanti /
GK16andhvc1u:5805: śrotraśaṣkulīṃ santānenāgatā antyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyanta iti prakriyāyāṃ śabdajāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyamāṇā ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:5808: yathāha bhagavān bhartṛhariḥ--- yaḥ saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇairupajanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5812: tathā śrūyamāṇā ye varṇā nādaśabdavācyā antyabuddhinirgrāhyasphoṭābhivyañjakāste dhvaniśabdenoktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5827: saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇānāṃ sthānaissaha yassaṃyogo viyogaśca tābhyām /
GK16andhvc1u:5831: saḥ sphoṭa iti prathamamutpadyamānaḥ śabdaḥ sphoṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5836: yathoktaṃ vṛttikṛtā-'anityapakṣe sthānakaraṇaprāptivibhāgapūrvakaṃ prathamamebhirnirvṛtto yaśśabdaḥ sa sphoṭa ucyata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5838: ghaṇṭādernirhnādaḥ anuraṇanaṃ tatsthānīyastattulya iti vyaṅgyasya thadhvanipadena vyavahāryatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5839: nanvevaṃvyaṅgyaviśeṣasyaiva dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ bhavenna tu rasādestasyānuraṇanarūpatvavirahādityata āha--anuraṇaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:5841: atha vācakasya śabdasya vācyasyārthasya ca dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ prasādhasati---tathetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5844: antyeti pūrvapūrvavarṇānubhavajanitasaṃskārasahakṛtā yā antyavarṇabuddhiḥ tayā nirgrāhyaḥ nitarāṃ vyaktarūpema grāhyo yaḥ sphoṭaḥ tasyābhivyañjakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5855: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam //
GK16andhvc1u:5857: teṣu tāvatsveva śrūyamāṇeṣu vakturyo 'nyo drutāvilambitādivṛttibhedātmā prasiddāduccāraṇavyāpārādabhyadhikaḥ sa dhvaniruktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5858: yadāha sa eva--- śabdasyordhvamabhivyaktervṛttibhede tu vaikṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5863: tadyogācca samastamapi kāvyaṃ bālapriyā dhvaniprakāśite śabde viṣaye utpannaiḥ antarālavartibhiḥ pratyayai sphoṭaviṣayakāvyaktapratyayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5865: yathoktaṃ bhāṣye “vyaktarūpagrahamānuguṇā hyanupākhyeyākārā bahava upāyabhūtāḥ pratyayā dhvanibhiḥ prakāśyamāne śabde utpadyamānāśśabdasvarūpāvagrahe hetavo bhavanti” iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5873: varṇeṣu svarūpataḥ parimāṇaviśeṣavattayā sthiteṣu teṣu tathāvidheṣvevākhaṇḍatayā śrotrendriyaviṣayatāṃ gateṣu ca satsu ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5878: yadi vā, sakalaṃ varṇaṃ sphuṭaṃ gṛhṇāti vā;
GK16andhvc1u:5879: na tu kiñjitgrahaṇāgrahaṇe sambhavato varṇasya niravayavatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5884: śloko 'yaṃ mañjūṣāyāmitthaṃ vyākhyātaḥ-- śabdasya sphoṭasya abhivyakterūrdhvaṃ vaikṛtā dhvanayo jāyante iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5896: na caivaṃvidhasya dhvanervakṣyamāṇaprabhedatadbhedasaṅkalanayā mahāviṣayasya yatprakāśanaṃ tadaprasiddhālaṅkāraviśeṣamātrapratipādanena locanam dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5897: tena vyatirekāvyatirekavyapadeśo 'pi na na yuktaḥ vācyavācakasaṃmiśra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5900: tena vācyo 'pi dhvaniḥ vācako 'pi śabdo dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5911: vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sarvoṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānyarūpaḥ sādhāraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5931: tathā ca śabdātmā kāvyamiti vyapadeśyaścetyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5943: asminnarthe dhvaniriti bhāve pratyaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5954: tatra dhvanisvarūpe bhāvitaṃ praṇihitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ tena vā camatkakārarūpeṇa bhāvitamadhivāsitamata eva mukulitalocanatvādivikārakāraṇaṃ ceto yeṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc1u:5959: pañcadhāpi dhvaniśabdārthe yena yatra yato yasya yasmai iti bahuvrīhyarthāśrayeṇa yathocitaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ suyojyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5960: vācye 'rthe tu dhvanau vācyaśabdena svātmā tenāvivakṣito 'pradhānīkṛtaḥ svātmā yenetyavivaśritavācyo vyañjako 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5962: bālapriyā sāmānyarūpo vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇassamāna iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:5969: nanu kramaprāptaṃ bhāktatvādipakṣamapratisamādhāya vṛttikṛtā 'sa ce'tyādinā dhvanibhedapradarśanamanucitamityata āha---udāharaṇapṛṣṭa ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5970: avivakṣitavācyādidhvanerudāharaṇe pradarśite tatra lakṣaṇāyāssamunmeṣādbhaktireva dhvaniriti śaṅkā susaṃpādā,
GK16andhvc1u:5973: atrānuktavavivakṣitavācyo va iti dvitīyodyotādāvanuvādo 'nupapannaḥ syādataḥ svayameva kārikākārasthāne sthitvetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5974: nanu pañjānāṃ dhvaniśabdārthānāṃ madhye kamarthamabhipretyāvivakṣitavācyo dhvanirityādisāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśa ityata āha--pañcadhāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5976: tatra vācakaḥ śabdo dhvanipadārtha iti pakṣe āvivakṣitaḥ vācyo yena śabdena /
GK16andhvc1u:5980: yasya yatsambandhitvena sa tathokta iti bahuvrīhirbodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5982: vāyyo dhvaniśabdārtha iti pakṣe viśeṣamāha---vācye 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5987: locana.m yadi vā karmadhārayeṇārthapakṣe avivakṣitaścāsau vācyaśceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5994: nanu ca vivakṣā cānyaparatvaṃ ceti viruddham /
GK16andhvc1u:5997: vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā hi tribhedo 'pi dhvanirubhābhyāmevābhyāṃ saṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5998: nanu tannāmapṛṣṭe etannāmaniveśanasya kiṃ phalam? ucyate--
GK16andhvc1u:5999: anena hi nāmadvayena dhvananātmani vyāpāre pūrvaprasiddhābhidhātātparyalakṣaṇātmakavyāpāratritayāvagatārthapratīteḥ pratipattṛgatāyāḥ prayoktrabhiprāyarūpāyāśca vivikṣāyā)
GK16andhvc1u:6021: asti dhvaniḥ sa cetyādiśca nirdeśaḥ kimartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6024: tatra ca vyāpāre dvitīyasyāpi--- śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarottapaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6025: taruṇi yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:6026: locana.m tata eva padārthamabhidhāyānvayaṃ ca tātparyaśaktyāvagamayyaiva bādhakavaśena tamupahatya sāddaśyātsulabhasamṛddhisambhārabhājanatāṃ lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc1u:6027: tallakṣaṇāprayojanaṃ śūrakṛtavidyasevakānāṃ praśastyamaśabdavācyatvena gopyamānaṃ sannāyikākucakalaśayugalamiva mahārghatāmupayaddhvanyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6031: na hi nirvidhnottamasiddhayo 'pi śrīparvatādaya imāṃ siddhiṃ vidadhyuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6035_1: vivakṣāyāśca sahakāritvaṃ darśitamiti tannāmabhyāṃ dhvanisvarūpameva projjīvitamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6051: atra nāmetyantasya kiyacciramityasya kimabhidhānamityasya ca dhvaniṃ krameṇāha---na hītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:6059: bhinnaṃ pṛthak locanam taveti bhinnaṃ padam /
GK16andhvc1u:6066: api tu rasajño 'ti tatprāptivadeva rasajñatāpyasya tapaḥ eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:6070: 'samāse vigalitatayā pratīyeta na pratīyatām' iti kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6079: yathā vā 'dhanavān sukhī'tyādilaukikavākye matubādyarthānvitasya dhanādeḥ prayojyatvādi sambandhena sukhādau cānvayaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6081: yataḥ śukaśābako 'yaṃ tvadadharāruṇyalābhasubhagambhāvukaṃ bimbaphalaṃ tvatsambandhitayā daśati,
GK16andhvc1u:6086: niravaśeṣeṇopabhoge sati hi prabandavicchedo bhavettathā netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6088: sa hi rasāsvādavārtānabhijño niravaśeṣameva bhojyadravyaṃ bhuṅkte /
GK16andhvc1u:6093: ucite kāle lābhaḥ bimbaphalatadāsvādalābhaḥ tapasa eva taporūpahetoreva /
GK16andhvc1u:6096: locanam atra ca traya eva vyāpārāḥ---abhidhā tātparyaṃ dhvananaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6101: kevalaṃ pūrvatra lakṣaṇaiva pradhānaṃ dhvananavyāpāre sahakāri /
GK16andhvc1u:6106: tena dvitīye 'pi bhede catvāra eva vyāpārāḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:6108_0: tasya khyāpanārthaṃ yadvaidagdhyena aucityāparityāgena cāṭuviracanaṃ uktarūpaṃ tadātmakaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:6108_1: taddvārakaṃ vibhāvasya ratyālambanabhūtasya taruṇīlakṣaṇasya uddīpanaṃ svābhiprāyānuguṇatayā
GK16andhvc1u:6116: asau śukaśābaka ityanena kāmukaḥ kaścidyuvā adharapāṭalaṃ bimbaphalaṃ daśatītyanenādharāsvādanādikañca sāddaśyāllakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6129: nanvevaṃrītyā vivakṣitānyaparavācye sarvatrāpi kiṃ lakṣaṇāsti? netyāha---
GK16andhvc1u:6135: yasmāt dvitīye 'pi prabhede śikhiriṇītyādau kvaciccatvāro vyāpārāḥ tasmādevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6136: tatra bhaktirūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā abhāve bhakterdhvanitvaśaṅkāparihārayostadānantaryaṃ tattadaśliṣṭaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6137: 'bhaktyā bibhartī'yādeḥ 'sā tu syādupalakṣaṇa'mityantagranthasya bhāvaṃ pradarśayannavatārayati--ayaṃ bhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6143: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvam rūpa-bhedād ayaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6146: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvaṃ rūpabhedādayaṃ dhvaniḥ ayamuktaprāro dhvanirbhaktyā naikatvaṃ bibharti bhinnarūpatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6147: vācyavyatiriktasyārthasya vācyavācakābhyāṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśaṃ yatra vyaṅgyaprādhānye sa dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6149: locanam prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti--- bhaktyā bibhartiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6150: uktaprakāra iti pañcasvartheṣu yojyam---śabde 'rthe vyāpāre vyaṅgye samudāye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:6172: tamatilaṅdhya tatsambaddhe 'nyasminnarthe tasya śabdasya vyavahāro 'tiśayito vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6178: tasyāḥ prayojanaṃ santāpasya sphuṭatayā pratipattiriti dhvananavyāpāro mukhyavṛttiparityāgānyathānupapattirūpayā vastusthityā sambhavannapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6181: nanu prayojanaviṣayatvādeva tasyādriyamāṇatvamavaśyambhāvīti kathamasatkalpatvamiti śaṅkāyāṃ tadvyāpāraviṣayasya na mukhyaṃ prayojanatvaṃ tallakṣaṇāsamanvayāt,
GK16andhvc1u:6186: ativyāpter athāvyāpter na cāsau lakṣyate tayā // DhvK_1.14 //
GK16andhvc1u:6192: yatra hi vyaṅgyakṛtaṃ mahatsauṣṭavaṃ nāsti tatrāpyupacaritaśabdavṛttyā prasidydhanurodhapravartitavyabahārāḥ locanam hi prayojanalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:6193: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāstīti kathaṃ dhvananaṃ lakṣaṇā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6197: nanu dhvananamavaśyambhāvīti kathaṃ tadvyatirikto 'sti viṣaya ityāha---mahatsauṣṭhavamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6198: ata eva prayojanasyānādaraṇīyatvādvyañjakatvena na kṛtyaṃ kiñciditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6201: nanu prayojanābhāve kathaṃ tathā vyavahāra ityāha---prasiddhyanurodheti /
GK16andhvc1u:6206: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ----yadi bhaktirdhvaniścaikaṃ tatvaṃ syāttadā hyudāhṛte viṣaye dhvanisadbhāvo lakṣaṇāyā abhāvo vā syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6238: yathā--- parimlānaṃ pīnastanajadhanasaṅgādubhayata- stanormadhyasyāntaḥ parimilanamaprāpya haritam /
GK16andhvc1u:6239: idaṃ vyastanyāsaṃ ślathabhujalatākṣepavalanaiḥ kṛśāṅgyāḥ santāpaṃ vadati bisinīpatraśayanam //
GK16andhvc1u:6241: viramia puṇo ramijjai pio jaṇo ṇatthi punaruttam //
GK16andhvc1u:6243: viramya punā ramyate priyo jano nāsti punaruktam //
GK16andhvc1u:6246: jaha gahio taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchintamahilāo //
GK16andhvc1u:6248: uttānenāpi rūpeṇa tatprayojanaṃ cakāsannigūḍhatāṃ nidhānavadapekṣata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6251: gūḍhatayā varṇane vā kiṃ bālapriyā paramatarītyā prasiddhiśabdaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate---vayantviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6252: prasiddhiḥ prayojanasya prakarṣeṇa prakaṭatayā siddhiḥ pratītiḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:6259: nanu dhvanisthale 'pi prayojanasya sphuṭāvabhāsamānatvādanigūḍhatvaṃ samānamiti śaṅkāyāṃ viśeṣamāha---uttānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6272: ajjāeṃ pahāro ṇavaladāe diṇṇo pieṇa thaṇavaṭṭe /
GK16andhvc1u:6273: miuo vi dūsaho vvia jāo hiae savattīṇam // .//
GK16andhvc1u:6275: mṛduko 'pi duḥsaha iva jato hṛdaye sapatnīnām // .//
GK16andhvc1u:6282: yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ // .//
GK16andhvc1u:6285_0: tathā--ajjeti kaniṣṭhabhāryāyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe navalatayā kāntenocitakrīḍāyogena mṛduko
GK16andhvc1u:6285_1: 'pi prahāro dattaḥ sapatnīnāṃ saubhāgyasūcakaṃ tatkrīḍāsaṃvibhāgamaprāptānāṃ hṛdaye
GK16andhvc1u:6294: ubhayataḥ dvayorbhāgayoḥ kṣepā śayyāprānteṣu nipātanāni valanāni vivartanāni ca /
GK16andhvc1u:6296: atra śayanasyācetanasya mukhyārthavacanakartṛtvānvayānupapatyā mukhyārthabādhena jñāpanaṃ sāddaśyāllakṣyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6314: tathā---- parārthe yaḥ pīḍābhanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarvoṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6315: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:6320: anyasya datto mṛṭuḥ praddāro 'nyasya ca sampadyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6325: tathāpyaprastute ikṣau praśasyamāne pīḍāyā anubhavanenāsambhavatā pīḍāvattvaṃ lakṣyate;
GK16andhvc1u:6327: nanvastyatra prayojanaṃ tatkimiti na dhvanyata ityāśaṅkyāha---na caivaṃvidha iti // 14 //
GK16andhvc1u:6329: yadvā--ucitāyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ yo yogaḥ sambhavettena hetunā /
GK16andhvc1u:6331: 'sapatnīnāṃ dussaho jāta' ityatra gamyaṃ hetuṃ viśeṣaṇadvārā darśayati---saubhāgyetyādyaprāptānāmityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:6334: mṛdossusahatayā mṛdurapi dussaha ityanyaśca virodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6335: atra mukhyārthasya dānasya bādhātprahāro datta ityatra dānena dānasādhyaṃ phalavatvaṃ lakṣyata ityāha---dānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6364: śabdo vyañjakatāṃ bibhrad dhvany-ukter viṣayībhavet // DhvK_1.15 //
GK16andhvc1u:6371: rūḍhā ye viṣaye 'nyatra śabdāḥ sva-viṣayād api /
GK16andhvc1u:6372: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktās te na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // DhvK_1.16 //
GK16andhvc1u:6375: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktāste na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // 16 //
GK16andhvc1u:6377: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye kvacitsambhavannapi locanam yata uktyantareṇeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6383: evaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ sadapi nādarāspadaṃ tatra ko dhvananavyāpāra ityuktvā yatra mūlata eva prayojanaṃ nāsti,
GK16andhvc1u:6385: lāvaṇyādyā ye śabdāḥ svaviṣayāllavaṇarasayuktatvādeḥ svārthādanyatra hṛdyatvādau rūḍhā;
GK16andhvc1u:6402: tadiha mukhyārthabādhatadyogaprayojanatrayasānnidhyāpekṣaṇarūpavyavadhānaśūnyatvaṃ rūḍhaśabdena darśitamiti prayojanarāhityamatra vyavatiṣṭhata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6408: te tasmin svaviṣayādanyatra prayuktā api na dhvaneḥ padaṃ bhavanti;
GK16andhvc1u:6416: na cātra prayojanaṃ kiñciduddiśya lakṣaṇā pravṛtteti na tadviṣayo dhvananavyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6424: anurodhī virodhī tulya iti lokaprasiddho 'rtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6426: pustake dṛśyamānāyā 'devaḍi'tyādigāthāyā granteṣu tatra tatrākṣarabhedā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc1u:6427: ataścāsyāḥ svarūpaṃ chāyāṃ ca niścetuṃ na śaknomi /
GK16andhvc1u:6439: yad uddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhalad-gatiḥ // DhvK_1.17 //
GK16andhvc1u:6442: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc1u:6443: locanam tadā bhaktisannidhau sarvatra dhvanivyavahāraḥ syādityativiyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6444: abhyupagabhyāpi brūmaḥ--bhavatu yatra yatra bhaktistatra tatra dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6445: tathāpi yadviṣayo lakṣaṇāvyāpāro na tadviṣayo dhvananavyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6450: na ca tadviṣayo 'pi dvitīyo lakṣaṇāvyāpāro yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6452: mukhyāṃ vṛttimabhidāvyāpāraṃ parityajya parisamāpya guṇavṛttyā lakṣaṇārūpayārthasyāmukhyasya darśanaṃ pratyāyanā,
GK16andhvc1u:6457: vadatītyādau lāvaṇyādiśabde ca bhaktessatve 'pi dhvanyabhāvasya darśitatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6469: nanvabhidhāmantarema lakṣaṇāvṛtterasambhavāttatparityāgaḥ kathamityataḥ parityajyeti padaṃ prakṛtānuguṇatayā vyācaṣṭe--parisamāpyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6475: tatra hi cārutvatiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣame prayojane kartavye yadi locanam prayojane tāvaddvitīyo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6477: yataḥ skhalantī bādakavyāpāreṇa vidhurīkriyamāṇā gatiravabodhanaśaktiryasya śabdasya tadīyo vyāpāro lakṣaṇā /
GK16andhvc1u:6480: tenāyaṃ lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyā na viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6494: 'naca lakṣaṇaive'tyatra hetutvena kārikāntyapādaṃ pāta yati---yata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6495: tathā ca 'naiva skhaladgati'rityanena lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6518: lakṣitena tīrādinā lakṣaṇayā prayojanarūpārthaḥ pratyāyyata iti kecit;
GK16andhvc1u:6525: yathā---“ā hanta kimidaṃ tanvi netrayoḥ śrāvaṇastava /
GK16andhvc1u:6531: tatra śravamādipadenāśrupātādireva lakṣyata ityato lakṣitalakṣaṇāyā abhāvādayanna tadviṣaya ityartha iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:6534: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthalakṣaṇe prayojane' śabdasyāmukhyatā tadā tasya prayoge duṣṭataiva syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6538: prayojanāvagamasya sukhasampattye hi sa śabdaḥ prayujyate tasminnamukhyārthe /
GK16andhvc1u:6539: yadi ca 'siṃho vaṭuḥ' iti śauryātiśaye 'pyavagamayitavye skhaladgatitvaṃ śabdasya tarhi tatparatītiṃ naiva kuryāditi kimarthaṃ tasya prayogaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6540: upacārema kariṣyatīti cettatrāpi prayojanāntaramanveṣyaṃ tatrāpyupacāra ityanavasthā /
GK16andhvc1u:6542: tarhi prayojane 'vagamayitavye na lakṣaṇākhyo vyāpāraḥ tatsāmagryabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6548: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣaṇa' iti pāṭhe tu kartavya ityasyotpādayitavye ityevārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6549: prayojane bodhye skhaladgatitvasya niṣedhānnāmukhyatāpadena tadeva vivakṣitamityāha---bādhakenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6551: duṣṭatvaṃ hi vyākaraṇasaṃskārarāhityādirūpamiti śaṅkāyāṃ pratipipādayiṣitārthapratītyajanakatvena vaiyarthyam;
GK16andhvc1u:6563: atha prayojane dhvananavyāpāraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan uktamevārthaṃ śaṅkāparihārābhyā pradarśayannāha---upacāreṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6570: tasmin prayojane 'pi upacāre pūrvavadaṅgīkārye tatrāpyanyadevaṃ tatrāpyanyadityanavasthā mūlakṣayakāriṇī syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6571: ataḥ skhaladgatitvābhyupagamo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6573: tathāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ kuta ityata āha---athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6578: tena yataḥ skhaladgateśśabdasya vyāpāro lakṣaṇā, tato hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6583: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
GK16andhvc1u:6590: na ca prayoge duṣṭatā kācit prayojanasyābidhnenaiva pratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6591: tenābhidhaiva mukhye 'rthe bādhakena pravivitsurnirudhyamānā satī acaritārthatvādanyatra prasarati /
GK16andhvc1u:6596: tato hetorvācakatvamabhidhāvyāpāramāśritā tadbādhanenotthānāttatpucchabhūtatvāccha guṇavṛttiḥ gauṇalākṣaṇikakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6601: evam 'ativyāpteratāvyāpterna cāsau lakṣyate tayā' iti kārikāgatātivyāptiṃ vyākhyāyāvyāptiṃ vyācaṣṭe---avyāptirapyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6611: bādhakenetyanantaraṃ vidhurīkṛteti ca kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6614: yathā pravāhādikamuddiśya gaṅgādiśabdasyāyaṃ mukhyārtha iti vyavahāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6616: tathā ca dvayorarthatvaṃ tulyaṃ mukhyatvāmukhyatvakṛta eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6620: na he śabdasya yaḥ kaścidevāṃmukhyo 'rthaḥ kintvayamartho 'sya śabdasyāmukhya iti niyata evetyatastathāvidhopadeśarūpasya /
GK16andhvc1u:6621: ayamartho 'smācchabdādboddhavya iti icchārūpasya vā saṅketasya grahamamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6625: tasmādityasiya kīrukayī sambandhaṃ darsayaṃstatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6629: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyante;
GK16andhvc1u:6631: locanam yatra yatra dhvanistatra tatra yadi bhaktirbhavenna syādavyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6635: kevalaṃ śabdastamarthaṃ lakṣayitvā tenaiva saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhajate-'siṃho baṭuḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6636: artho vārthāntaraṃ lakṣayitvā svavācakena tadvācakaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:6637: śabdārthau vā yugapattaṃ lakṣayitvā anyābhyāmeva śabdārthābhyāṃ miśrībhavata ityevaṃ lākṣaṇikādgauṇasya bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6648_1: 'śikhariṇī'tyādau sā pravartata eveti tatra tadabhāvābhidhānamasaṅgatamiti pūrvapakṣamabhyupetya
GK16andhvc1u:6652: nanvevaṃ gauṇasya lākṣaṇikādbhedaḥ kuta ityata āha--'kevalam' ityādinā 'bheda' ityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:6677: dvirephaśabdasya hi yo 'bhidheyo bhramaraśabdaḥ dvau rekau yasyeti kṛtvā tena bhramaraśabdena yasya saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ ṣaṭpadalakṣaṇasyārthasya so 'rtho dvirephaśabdena lakṣyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6681: vaiparītyāt yathā--śatrumuddiśya kaścidbravīti--'kimivopakṛtaṃ na tena mama' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6723: tathāhi-vibhāvānubhāvapratipādeke kāvye mukhye 'rthe tāvadbādhakānu praveśo 'pyasambhāvya iti ko lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6726: iha cābhidheyānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvādīnāmavinābhūtā rasādaya iti lakṣyante,
GK16andhvc1u:6731: dhūmaśabdasya svārthaviśrāntatvānna tāvati vyāpāra iti cet,
GK16andhvc1u:6741: vṛttau vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśabdena tadavāntarabhedo mukhyo 'saṃlakṣyakramo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6746: atrāpi lakṣaṇā kinna syādata āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6751: asti vā nāsti veti cintitayā mukhyārthabādhayā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6755: abhidheyenāvinābhūtasya kenāpi sambandhena sambaddhasya pratītirjñānaṃ taddheturvā /
GK16andhvc1u:6776: locanam nanvevaṃ dhūmāvagamanānantarāgnismaramavadvibhāvādipratipatyanantaraṃ ratyādicittavṛttipratipattarit śabdavyāpāra evātra nāsti /
GK16andhvc1u:6777: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pratītisvarūpajño mīmāṃsakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ--kimatra paracittavṛttimātre pratipattireva rasapratipattirabhimatā bhavataḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6780: yastvalaukikacamatkārātmā rasāsvādaḥ kāvyagatavibhāvādicarvaṇāprāṇo nāsau smaraṇānumānādisāmyena khilīkārapātrīkartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6781: kiṃ tu laukikena kāryakāraṇānumānādinā saṃskṛtahṛdayo vibhāvādikaṃ pratipadyamāna eva na tāṭasthyena pratipadyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6788: 'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityatra gaṅgāśabdo netyatra mukhyārthabādha eva heturatasya eva lakṣaṇābījamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6789: tarhihāpi mukhyārthabādho lakṣaṇā ca syat netyāha - na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6791: vibhāvādipratītyanantarabhāvinī ratyādipratītirdhūmādipratītijanyāgnyādismṛtisamānaiveti sā śabdavyāpārajanyā na bhavati dūre tasyā vyañjanājanyatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6797: dvitīye rasapratīteritarapratītivailakṣṇyena dṛṣṭāntābhāvo doṣa ityāśayena sopahāsaṃ pṛcchannāha--idamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6822: tene saṃskṛtahṛdaya ityanena tatsaṃskāro 'pi pratipattuḥ rasapratītāvupayogīti darśitam /
GK16andhvc1u:6833: na cāsau carvaṇā pramāṇāntarato jātā pūrvaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6838: yadāha--'vibhāvo vijñānārthaḥ loke kāraṇamevābhidhīyate na vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6843: ata eva parakīyā na cittavṛttirgamyata ityabhiprāyeṇa 'vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ' iti sūtre sthāyigrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:6853: sahṛdayānāṃ yattattaccittavṛttitanmayībhavanaṃ tasyocitā yā carvaṇā arthādvibhāvādeḥ tatprāṇatayā tadupayogitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6863: viśiṣṭatayā bhāvyante jñāyante sthāyivyabhicāriṇo 'neneti vibhāvaḥ pramadodyānādiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6867: cittavṛttihetuṣu loke kāramamityeva vyavahāro na tu vibhāva itītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6876: kintu tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sthāyyādirūpāṇāṃ sambandhi yatsāmājikānāṃ tanmayībhavanaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6879: ata eva yasmādanubhavanamuktarūpameva na parakīyacittavṛtyanumitimātraṃ tasmāddhetorevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6885: vyabhicārī tu cittavṛttyātmatve 'pi mukhyacittavṛttiparavaśa eva carvyata iti vibhāvānubhāvamadhye gaṇitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6893: bālapriyā iti ṣaṣṭhyantasthāyigrahame kartavye 'pyanubhāvagrahaṇenaiva sthāyipratītirbhavatīti tanna kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6899: nanvevaṃ 'sthāyī raso bhavatī'tyādi tatra tatra sūtrakārādivacanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭetetyata āha--sthāyinastviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6902: tasya paragatasthāyinaḥ sambandhino ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ taducitāyāścittavṛttessahṛdayātmani yassaṃskārastasyodbodhena sundaracarvaṇāyā udayādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6903: uktañca kāvyānuśāsanavyākhyāne 'aucityantu tatsthāyigatatvena kāraṇāditayā prasiddhānāmadhunā carvaṇopayogitayā vibhāvāditvālambanādi'ti /
GK16andhvc1u:6905: rasacarvaṇā hi hṛdayasaṃvādapurassarī hṛdayasaṃvāde ca nidānaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6907: tasyāñcāvasthāyāṃ pramadādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pulakādibhiḥ kāryaiśca bhūyo bhūyo 'vadhṛtasvakāraṇavyāptikaiḥ sthāyino ratyāderavagamo bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:6909: nanu cittavṛttitvāviśeṣātsyāyīva vyabhicāryapi sūtre grahaṇaṃ nārhatītyata āha---vyabhicārītviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6910: vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyicittavṛttiṃ prati guṇatvena vibhāvādiprāyatvāttanmadhye sa nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6915: yathoktamabhinavabhāratyāṃ “kathantarhi sūtre niṣpattiriti neyaṃ rasasyāpi tu tadviṣayarasānāyāḥ tanniṣpattyā yadi tadekāyattajīvitasya rasasya niṣpattirucyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6919: prabandhena pravṛttaṃ yadbandhusamāgamādikāraṇaṃ tenoditā yā harṣādilaukikacittavṛttiḥ tasyā nyagbhāvena adhaḥkaraṇena tadvyatirekeṇeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:6925: yathā vā daṇḍavakrādīnāmutpādanaṃ vyāpārastathā locanam nanu yadi neyaṃ jñaptirna vā niṣpattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6933: yata eva na dṛṣṭaṃ tata evālaukikamityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:6944: hi tadeva kāvyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ bālapriyā vibhāvādīnāṃ na jñāpanaṃ na vā utpādanaṃ vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6953: nanu jñāpakatvasya kārakatvasya vā abhāve vibhāvādīnāṃ rasapratītyarthamupādānaṃ vyarthaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6956: vibhāvādestu tadabhāve 'pi carvaṇopayogitvānnānarthakayamityāśayena pariharati---na jñāpaka ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6968: nanvevamalaukikatve rasasya tatsādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6975: vācakaśabdaikagamyatve hi rasasya vācyārthavallaukikatvaṃ kathañcicchakyaśaṅkamanuprāsādināpi vācakatvaśūnyena vyaṅgyatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc1u:6976: na cānuprāsavyaṅgyaṃ vastu loke dṛṣṭacaramato 'pi rasasyālaukikatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6981: abhidhāyā evābhāve tatpṛṣṭhavartinyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ prasaṅga eva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6983: kāvyātmako 'nuprasādiviśiṣṭo yaḥ locanam paṭhaṃścarvyamāṇaśca sahṛdayo lokaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6985: tatra 'upādāyāpi ye heyā' iti nyāyena kṛtapratītikasyānupayoga eveti śabdasyāpīha dhvananavyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6997: yadeva kāvyaṃ paṭhitañcarvitañca tadeva punaḥ punaḥ paṭyate carvyate cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7007: so 'yaṃ nyāyo 'tra na pravartata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7011: yadyarthaṃpratītivyavadhānāpekṣayaiva śabdasya vyañjakatvaṃ bhavettadāvaśyaṃ kramo lakṣyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7017: tattadarthe tattatpadasya yassamayaḥ saṅketaḥ tadbalena tattatsaṅketagrahaṇasahakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7033: vākyārtha ekaḥ syāt vākyārthe bhedo nāṅgīkriyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7037: viramya yo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya tadayogo yataḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:7043: locanam niyamābhāva iti tena “agrihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ” iti śrutau khādecchvāmāṃsamityeṣa nārtha ityatra kā prameti prasajyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7044: tatrāpi na kācidiyattetyanāśvāsatā ityevaṃ vākyabhedo dūṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:7045: iha tu vibhāvādyeva pratipādyamānaṃ carvaṇāviṣayatonmukhamiti samayādyupayogābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7049: iha tu vibhāvādicarvaṇādbhutapuṣpavattatkālasāraivoditā na tu pūrvāparakālānubandhinīti laukikādāsvādādyogiviṣayāccānya evāyaṃ rasāsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7050: ata eva 'śikhariṇa' ityādāvapi bālapriyā samayādiriti pāṭhe sa eva yena pūrvamartho buddhaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7069: kāvyavyatariktaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca vākyaṃ samayaprakaraṇādisahakṛtaṃ yugapatkrameṇa vā ekamarthameva pratipādayatītyato 'nekārthabodhakatvena vākyabhedo naiva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:7070: samayaprakaraṇādyapekṣāṃ vinā vākyasyārthabodhakatvāṅgīkāre cāvyavasthitārthakatvenābodhakatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ syādityevaṃ vākyabhedo doṣa iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7082: ataśca tāṃ prati samayāderanapekṣaṇe 'pi nāvyavasthitārthakatvena doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7086: taduttarakāle tu kṛtārtho 'smīti ca pratītiḥ śāstrato jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7096: tatkālaḥ vartamānakāla eva sāro yasyāḥ saiva /
GK16andhvc1u:7100: yato rasāsvādasya kasyaciddhvanibhedasya sā tu syādupalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:7101_1: locanam mukhyārthabādhādikramamanapekṣyaiva sahṛdayā vaktabhiprāyaṃ cāṭuprītyātmakaṃ saṃvedayante /
GK16andhvc1u:7102: ata eva grandhakāraḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau bhakterabhāvamabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc1u:7105: yadi tu na kupyate 'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ' ityādāvavivakṣitavācye 'pi mukhyārthabādhādilakṣaṇāsāmagrīmanapekṣyaiva vyaṅgyārthaviśrāntirityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:7107: nanu mā bhūddhvaniriti bhaktiriti caikaṃ rūpam /
GK16andhvc1u:7117: tadupalakṣaṇamukhena ca dhvanimapi bālapriyā uktavidhamanitarasādhāraṇaṃ saubhāgyaṃ tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7122: tarhi kuto bhavataiva lakṣaṇāmabhyupetya vyākhyātamityata āha--asmābhistviti /
GK16andhvc1u:7126: nanu kasya nāma kopastattvaṃ kathyatāmityatrāha---yadi tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:7138: upalakṣaṇaṃ vastu sarvatra na bhavatīti sampratipannamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7144: dhvanilakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ lakṣaṇaphalasyetaravyāvṛttatayā dhvanijñānasyopalakṣaṇabhūtayā bhakatyaiva samabhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7150: yadi ca guṇavṛttyaiva dhvanirlakṣyata ityucyate tadabhidhāvyāpāreṇa taditaro 'laṅkāravargaḥ samagra eva lakṣyata iti pratyekamalaṅkārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7153: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
GK16andhvc1u:7158: sa ca prāgeva saṃsiddha ityayatnasampannasamīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7159: ye 'pi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyamanākhyeyameva dhvanerātmānamāmnāsiṣuste 'pi na parikṣya vādinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7164: tathā hetubalātkāryaṃ jāyata iti tārkikairukte kimidānīmiśvaraprabhṛtīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ jñātṝṇāṃ vā kṛtyamapūrvaṃ syāditi sarvo nirārambhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:7172: ata eva mūlakārikā sākṣāttannirākaraṇārthā na śrūyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7173: vṛttikṛttu nirākṛtamapi prameyaśayyāpūraṇāya kaṇṭhena bālapriyā abhidhāvyāpāre /
GK16andhvc1u:7177: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvasya samastālaṅkāravyāpakatvāttasya cābhidhāvayāpārajīvitatvāttannirūpaṇe kṛte satyalaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ tadgranthakārāṇāṃ niṣphalameva bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7189: nanu kārikākāreṇa itarapakṣa ivālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣaḥ kimiti na pratikṣipta iti śaṅkāṃ pariharan 'ye 'pī'tyādigranthamavatārayati---evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7192: na ca tasyālakṣaṇīyatve tatsambhavati iti tannirākaraṇanāntarīyakatvenālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣo 'pi nirākṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7193: nanu tarhi kimiti vṛttikṛtā tatpakṣo 'nūdya nirākṛta ityata āha---vṛttikṛditi /
GK16andhvc1u:7195: prameyasya śayyā sanniveśaviśeṣaḥ yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yadyanākhyeyatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva vastūnāṃ tatprasaktam /
GK16andhvc1u:7196: yadi punardhvanerātiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ locanam tatpakṣamanūdya nirākaroti---ye 'pītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:7197: uktayā nītyā 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:7198: vakṣyamāṇayā tu nītyā viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati 'arthāntare saṅkramitaṃ ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:7199: tatra prathamoddyote dhvaneḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇameva kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:7200: dvitīyoddyote kārikākāro 'vāntaravibhāgaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca vidadhadanuvādamukhena mūlavibhāgaṃ dvividhaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:7204: yathā 'tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi sphuranti' itivadatiśayoktyānākhyeyatoktā sārarūpatāṃ pratipādayitumiti darśitamiti śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:7206: anākhyeyatvapakṣasyāpi svayamanirākaraṇe tatpūraṇaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7207: uktayā nītyetyādau yathāsaṃkhyena sambandha ityāśayenopapādayati---yatrārtha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7210: vṛttau 'sa ca dvividha' ityādinā viśeṣalakṣaṇakathanaṃ kārikākārāśayānusāreṇetyāha--tatra prathamodyota ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7214: kintvatiśayittvāditi cettarhi tadabhidhānaṃ yuktamevetyāha vṛttau---'yadi punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7225: atra te 'pītyapiśabdena svasyāpi sarvatra yuktabhidhāyitvaṃ granthakṛtā sūcitamiti ca bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:7227: “nidrārdhamīlitaddaśo madamantharāṇi nāpyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni adyāpi me mṛgaddaśo madhurāṇi tasyāḥ” ityādyapādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:7236: locana.m kiṃ locanaṃ vināloko bhāti candrikayāpi hi /
GK16andhvc1u:7250: api kiṃ bhāti kiṃ sphurati na pratyakṣaviṣayo bhavatītyaprastutārthaḥ tatsāmyaṃ cātra dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7263: atha ca yasyāḥ pratibhāyāḥ unmīlanayuktyā prakāśayogena /
GK16andhvc1u:7264: viśvam kṣaṇādunmīlati navanavatayā bhāti svātmanyevāyatane viśrāntāṃ vāsanārūpeṇāvasthitām,
GK16andhvc1u:7267: vande ityādyartho 'pi bodhya iti sarvaṃ śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:7268: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ mandaḥ kvāhaṃ tena mayā kṛtā /
